cards.text: The cleric who casts sanctuary loses this round of battle but is not discarded; it returns to the pool instead. (Def/4)

cards.name: Wind Walk
cards.text: The champion and all his allies this round are treated as flyers. (Def/4)

cards.name: Bark Skin
cards.text: Adds 2 levels to a single defender. (Def/4)

cards.name: Charm
cards.text: Opponent loses one ally of the caster's choice, chosen immediately. (Off/4)

cards.name: Dispel Magic
cards.text: Cancels the effect of any spell. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Darkness
cards.text: This battle ends immediately with no victor or loser; champions return to their pools, allies to the players' hands, spells are discarded. Darkness has no effect against monsters. (Def/4)

cards.name: Protection
cards.text: The opponent cannot use undead in this battle round; any already played as allies are discarded. An undead champion loses the battle but returns to the pool. (Def/4)

cards.name: Chariot of Sustarre
cards.text: One champion or two allies can fly for one round of battle. (Def/4)

cards.name: Sunray
cards.text: The sunray kills all undead in one player's pool. (Off/3)

cards.name: Wall of Thorns
cards.text: Cast only when defending. Only attackers of level 3 or higher can cross the wall. (Def/4)

cards.name: Wall of Fire
cards.text: Cast only when defending. Only attackers of level 4 or higher can cross the wall. (Off/4)

cards.name: Holy Word
cards.text: Destroys all undead allies on both sides of a battle instantly. (Off/4)

cards.name: Raise Dead
cards.text: Any one defeated champion can be selected from the player's discard pile and placed back in his hand. (Def/3/5)

cards.name: Flame Strike
cards.text: Destroys any number of opposing allies with levels totaling 6 or less, selected by the caster. Discard immediately. (Off/4)

cards.name: Protection from Lightning
cards.text: Lightning cannot harm the caster or his allies in this battle. (Def/4)

cards.name: Silence
cards.text: The opposing champion cannot cast any spells in this battle. (Off/4)

cards.name: Invisibility to Undead
cards.text: This champion ignores undead opponents.

cards.name: Wall of Fog
cards.text: No attacks are allowed against any player until the caster's next turn. (Off/3)

cards.name: Forget
cards.text: One ally 'forgets' to attack or defend this turn; discard the ally. (Off/4)

cards.name: Web
cards.text: Destroys any opposing allies of level 3 or less already in play. (Off/4)

cards.name: Blink
cards.text: A champion who is about to lose a round of battle escapes to the player's pool, but the battle is still lost. (Def/4)

cards.name: Hold Undead
cards.text: Opposing undead allies have no effect on the outcome of this battle. (Off/4)

cards.name: Charm Monster
cards.text: An opposing monster returns to its pool; the caster wins this round of battle. (Off/4)

cards.name: Wind of Disenchantment
cards.text: An anti-magic storm sweeps across the cosmos, destroying all magical items in play.

cards.name: Black Tentacles
cards.text: All champions of level 4 or less die, regardless of whether they are in battle or in pools. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Fire Shield
cards.text: (Off/4)

cards.name: Ice Storm
cards.text: Destroys all champions and allies of level 4 or less in play anywhere.

cards.name: Phantasmal Killer
cards.text: The champion gains one level for each ally played against him. (Off/4)

cards.name: Solid Fog
cards.text: Unearthly fog prevents all attacks against all players until this player's next turn.

cards.name: Animate Dead
cards.text: A wizard who casts this spell can fight again in the next round of battle, regardless of whether he won or lost the previous round. (Def/4)

cards.name: Cloudkill
cards.text: Opposing allies of level 3 or less are discarded and no more can be played this round. (Off/4)

cards.name: Feebleminded
cards.text: An opposing spellcaster cannot cast any spells for the rest of this round. (Off/4)

cards.name: Magic Jar
cards.text: If the defender is defeated, the current attacking champion becomes the defending champion in the next round of this battle and then is discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Faithful Hound
cards.text: Only flyers can attack any realm until the player's next turn.

cards.name: Passwall
cards.text: Negates any wall spell. (Def/4)

cards.name: Rock to Mud
cards.text: Only flyers can attack this player's realms until the player's next turn. (Def/4)

cards.name: Chain Lightning
cards.text: (Off/4)

cards.name: Death Fog
cards.text: Kills all champions of level 5 or less in one player's pool and prevents survivors from attacking until after that player's next turn. (Off/3)

cards.name: Death Spell
cards.text: Kills any one champion or ally of the caster's choosing of level 7 or less. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Disintegrate
cards.text: Destroy's one realm, regardless of position. The destroyed realm must be discarded. This player can make no attacks this turn. (Off/3)

cards.name: Geas
cards.text: The affected champion can neither attack nor defend until after the owner's next turn. (Off/3)

cards.name: Banishment
cards.text: Destroys one monster of the caster's choice. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Control Undead
cards.text: The caster can ask any player for his largest undead ally card and use it in this round of battle. The ally is discarded afterward. (Off/4)

cards.name: Finger of Death
cards.text: Kills any one champion or ally of level 5 or less. (Off/4)

cards.name: Spell Turning
cards.text: Turns a just-cast spell back at its caster, as if the original target had cast it. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Ancient Curse
cards.text: Choose one champion with an attached artifact or magical item to be killed immediately. Discard the champion and his possessions.

cards.name: Calm
cards.text: This magical calm undoes the harmful effect of an event, but only for the player of this card.

cards.name: Discovery of Spellfire
cards.text: The user can examine all other player's hands and discard one card from each.

cards.name: Magical Champion
cards.text: Attach this item to an ally from your hand. The ally becomes a champion (hero) until discarded for any reason. Its level is unchanged. (Def)

cards.name: Traitor
cards.text: One ally of this player's choice switches sides for the duration of this round.

cards.name: Chaos Shield
cards.text: A champion with this shield gains 1 level for every ally currently opposing him.

cards.name: Slave Realm of Tunek
cards.text: No cleric or wizard can attack this realm.

cards.name: Phorbes's Scrolls
cards.text: Besides adding 7 levels, the scrolls force the largest enemy ally played so far to be discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Mercenary Gold
cards.text: One opposing ally of level 1 or 2, chosen by this player, is discarded.

cards.name: Living Scroll
cards.text: The Living Scroll defeats a hero or cleric automatically. But it is automatically defeated by a wizard or monster.

cards.name: Ren's Bell of Death
cards.text: Allies of level 4 or higher cannot be used against the champion who carries Ren's Bell of Death.

cards.name: The Labyrinth Map of Shuuc
cards.text: A champion with this map is never discarded; if defeated, he escapes into the labyrinth and returns to the player's pool at the end of the player's next turn.

cards.name: Annulus
cards.text: At the beginning of its owner's turn, this helm of telepathy (fashioned from a mummified illithid's head) allows the player to examine an opponent's hand.

cards.name: Scroll of 7 Leagues
cards.text: The possessor of this scroll (and allies) can attack any realm without flying. (Def)

cards.name: Map of Life
cards.text: No player can play a realm or rebuild a realm until this player's next turn.

cards.name: Supernatural Chill
cards.text: Unnatural winter strips 2 levels from every champion and ally until this player's next turn. Any card reduced to level 0 is discarded immediately.

cards.name: Map to a Mercenary Army
cards.text: Offensive wizard spells have their levels (if any) halved (rounding up) when used against this ally.

cards.name: Pit Trap!
cards.text: Traps a winning champion so a realm is not razed. The champion is discarded as if he had lost the battle.

cards.name: Mind Flayer Lord
cards.text: The illithid immediately destroys all opposing allies of level 3 or less. The illithid can only be joined by allies of at least level 4.

cards.name: Aurak Draconian Lord
cards.text: If the aurak is defeated, it also forces the champion who killed it to be discarded.

cards.name: Ego Coin
cards.text: A champion with this coin can have any number of attached artifacts, and of any world. (Def)

cards.name: Chest of Many Things
cards.text: The champion with this chest can fly, and can function as a hero, wizard, cleric, or monster; the player chooses which type of champion before each round. (Def)

cards.name: Gelatinous Cube
cards.text: If the opposing champion loses in combat, his attachments are transferred to the cube. It receives all bonuses from the items while under its control. When the cube is defeated, the cards go to their owner's discard pile.

cards.name: Gatekeeper
cards.text: Immune to events and offensive spells. Can be sent to the Abyss to send home all champions (champions return to the player's hand).

cards.name: Age of Entropy
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. At the end of each player's turn (after discarding down to maximum hand size), that player must discard a card from his hand or pool, or raze a realm.

cards.name: Orb of Green Dragonkind
cards.text: Once per turn can duplicate the level and special powers of any dragon in play. The orb cannot be used again until the player's next turn.

cards.name: The Undead Htimsen
cards.text: Undead. Flyer. If played between 6 PM and 6 AM his level rises to 10. Spiritual kin to the Gib Htimsen, this vampire automatically defeats psionicists.

cards.name: Tapestry of the Stag
cards.text: This player's champions are immune to the special powers (but not the levels) of all Ravenloft champions and allies.

cards.name: Dori the Barbarian's Cape
cards.text: Champion cannot be discarded by harmful events, offensive spells, or psionic powers. Once per turn, he can cancel one helpful event played. He must attack every turn, if possible, or be discarded.

cards.name: Weasel Attack!
cards.text: When attacking, this player can choose an opponent's champion to take his champion's place in combat. That player must fight with his own cards. If he wins, the realm is automatically razed; both he and the event player draw spoils. If he loses, his champion is discarded and his foremost realm is razed; the event player draws spoils. (Harmful)

cards.name: The Barbarian's Decree
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. The glory of combat demands that all players attack each turn (if possible). Any who do not must discard down to 5 cards at the end of their turn. Those who do attack are rewarded by the gods: Their champions may attack twice each round unless defeated in combat or the realm is razed.

cards.name: The Abyssal Vortex
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Wish and Limited Wish spells cannot be cast. All spells and allies played while this card is in effect are discarded into the Abyss.

cards.name: Prismal the Outrageous
cards.text: Can cast wizard and cleric spells and is immune to offensive magical items. Prismal and his allies can attack any Forgotten Realms realm, regardless of position or powers, and he gains two spoils of victory if he razes it.

cards.name: Malatra, the Living Jungle
cards.text: Malatra can defend itself as a level 6 monster. It cannot be attacked by any champion or ally that is a swimmer. The level of attacking champions and allies that are not flyers is halved.

cards.name: Mayor Charles Oliver O'Kane
cards.text: His allure and charm are beyond compare, and all female heroes, wizards, and clerics who face him in battle return to their pools, defeated. He gains 3 levels when defending a Forgotten Realms realm.

cards.name: Bengoukee the Witch Doctor
cards.text: Can cast wizard and cleric spells and is immune to all spells cast in phase 3. Phase 4 spells cast by the witch doctor are at twice the level bonus.

cards.name: Big Chief Bagoomba
cards.text: Bagoomba is a figurehead of great charisma. When defending, the levels of his allies are doubled, and opposing allies of level 3 or less cannot be played.

cards.name: The Genie Bottle
cards.text: All spells in play are dispelled, including a just-cast spell, and all holdings and rule cards are removed from play. Can be Calmed by individual players but cannot be canceled. (Harmful)

cards.name: Estate Transference
cards.text: This spell places a realm and any attached holding in the Abyss. If spell-turned or reflected, the caster of this spell is placed in the Abyss. This player can make no attacks this turn. Limit one per deck. (Off/3)

cards.name: Starshine
cards.text: Starshine and her allies can attack any realm regardless of its position or powers. If defeated, she can be placed beneath a realm to duplicate the effects of any opposing holding in play.

cards.name: The Starving Artist
cards.text: If on the losing side of a battle, no one gains a spoils of victory, and one opponent (this player's choice) must discard his hand down to two.

cards.name: The King of the Elves
cards.text: Automatically defeats any wizard played against him but is instantly defeated by an undead champion. If defeated in battle, all wizards of base level 7 or higher are discarded from every player's pool.

cards.name: Sakornia
cards.text: Sakornia gains 3 additional levels when using an artifact.

cards.name: Edormira, Red Dragon
cards.text: Flyer. No monster can defend against Edormira.

cards.name: Gloriana
cards.text: Gloriana can cause a gust of wind to blow all flyers out of battle; no flyers can be played against her.

cards.name: Gib Ekim
cards.text: Gib can fight as either a wizard (5) or a hero (7); the player must choose at the start of the round.

cards.name: Neirgral, Green Dragon
cards.text: Flyer. Neirgral is so frightening that no allies of level 4 or less can be played on either side.

cards.name: Dagaronzie, Green Dragon
cards.text: Flyer. Dagaronzie can instantly destroy any two allies played against it in a round of battle.

cards.name: Fejyelsae
cards.text: If any allies are played with Fejuelsae, she drops to level 7.

cards.name: Dragon Rage!
cards.text: All creatures fear the dragon rage! Every player must discard one champion from his hand or pool.

cards.name: Shalbaal, Red Dragon
cards.text: Flyer. Every time Shalbaal wins a round of battle, the player randomly draws one card from the defeated player's hand and discards it. The player must laugh while doing this.

cards.name: Delsenora
cards.text: Delsenora is also an oracle. She can cancel the effect of one event card for this player, but must be discarded afterward.

cards.name: Gib Evets
cards.text: This creature is so magic-resistant that magical items and spells have no effect against it; only artifacts can hurt it.

cards.name: Dori the Barbarian
cards.text: Dori gains 2 levels when fighting a cleric or a wizard.

cards.name: Gib Htimsen
cards.text: The nether monstrosity is immune to all spells, events, magical items, and artifacts.

cards.name: Darbee
cards.text: Darbee gains 4 levels when fighting a monster.

cards.name: Aurum, Gold Dragon
cards.text: Flyer. Aurum gains 1 extra level per friendly ally (in addition to the ally's bonus).

cards.name: Halcyon
cards.text: Every time Halcyon wins a round of battle, the player can return one card from the discard pile to his hand.

cards.name: Stryck
cards.text: When Stryck attacks, she gets to pick her opponent from those champions in the defender's pool.

cards.name: Alicia
cards.text: Alicia's protective spells give her complete immunity against magical items; opponents' magical items have no effect.

cards.name: Red Zeb
cards.text: No allies of level 3 or less can be played against the horrid Zeb.

cards.name: The Avatar
cards.text: The Avatar instantly destroys all undead champions and/or allies.

cards.name: Smolder, Red Dragon
cards.text: Flyer. If Smolder loses a round of battle, he destroys one of his owner's holdings for revenge.

cards.name: Lovely Colleen
cards.text: All monsters are awed by her beauty. Colleen wins the round automatically if the opposing champion is a monster.

cards.name: Ember, the Red Dragon
cards.text: Flyer. If Ember is defeated, the victor can draw two spoils of victory cards (the dragon's hoard).

cards.name: Andra the Wise
cards.text: Andra carries an enchanted staff that prevents any undead allies from being played against her.

cards.name: Karm, Black Dragon
cards.text: Flyer. Karm can cast wizard spells but is excessively proud; no allies can be played to aid him.

cards.name: Waterdeep
cards.text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Waterdeep.

cards.name: Menzoberranzan
cards.text: Can be played at any time. Immune to flyers.

cards.name: Zhentil Keep
cards.text: Zhentil Keep can defend itself as a level 5 cleric.

cards.name: Shadowdale
cards.text: Any champion can cast cleric and wizard spells when defending Shadowdale.

cards.name: Moonshae Isles
cards.text: The Moonshaes can defend themselves as a level 2 hero. All defending allies gain 3 levels.

cards.name: Thay
cards.text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Thay.

cards.name: Pirate Isles
cards.text: Flyers cannot attack this realm.

cards.name: Ravens Bluff
cards.text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Ravens Bluff.

cards.name: The Great Rift
cards.text: Flyers cannot attack this realm.

cards.name: Myth Drannor
cards.text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Myth Drannor. Increases player's maximum hand by one.

cards.name: Jungles of Chult
cards.text: Chult can defend itself as a level 5 monster.

cards.name: Sword Coast
cards.text: The defending player can return one ally to his hand after each round of battle.

cards.name: Anauroch
cards.text: All attackers lose one level.

cards.name: Impiltur
cards.text: All champions and allies who defend Impiltur gain 1 level.

cards.name: Icewind Dale
cards.text: The attacking champion must discard one magical item chosen by the defender.

cards.name: The High Moor
cards.text: Any defending monster gains 4 levels.

cards.name: Damara
cards.text: Double the level of a defending Forgotten Realms champion.

cards.name: Dragonspear Castle
cards.text: All allies of a defending monster gain 2 levels.

cards.name: Daggerdale
cards.text: Allies cannot be used when attacking this realm.

cards.name: Darkhold
cards.text: All defenders of Darkhold gain 2 levels if Zhentil Keep is in play anywhere.

cards.name: Haunted Hall of Eveningstar
cards.text: Draw one card and place it in your hand when this realm is played or rebuilt.

cards.name: Evermeet
cards.text: Any champion can use wiizard spells when defending Evermeet. Flyers cannot attack.

cards.name: Berdusk
cards.text: A wizard or cleric gains 3 levels when defending the attached realm.

cards.name: Tantras
cards.text: No spells can be cast when attacking or defending Tantras.

cards.name: Mulmaster
cards.text: Draw another card every time a spell card is played.

cards.name: Hillsfar
cards.text: Any champion gains 3 levels when defending the attached realm.

cards.name: Suzail
cards.text: Any champion can cast wizard spells when defending the attached realm. If attached to Cormyr, all defenders also gain 4 levels.

cards.name: Arabel
cards.text: The attached realm can defend itself as a level 4 monster.

cards.name: Fortifications
cards.text: Each defender of the attached realm gains 2 levels.

cards.name: Fortifications
cards.text: Each defender of the attached realm gains 3 levels.

cards.name: Selune
cards.text: Undead cannot attack the attached realm.

cards.name: Peasant Militia
cards.text: Each champion and ally attacking the attached realm loses 1 level.

cards.name: Alias the Sell-Sword
cards.text: Immune to offensive spells.

cards.name: King Azoun IV
cards.text: All allies of King Azoun IV gain 1 level.

cards.name: Maligor the Red
cards.text: Once per battle Maligor can shift one opposing ally to his own side.

cards.name: Elminster the Mage
cards.text: Immune to offensive spells.

cards.name: Drizzt Do' Urden
cards.text: When defending, Drizzt must be defeated twice in one battle before he is discarded.

cards.name: Midnight, Goddess of Magic
cards.text: If only one Midnight is in play, wizards cannot cast spells without her permission. She also destroys all magical items held by the opposing champion.

cards.name: Torg Mac Cei, the Ironlord
cards.text: Torg's level is doubled when defending or attacking the Great Rift.

cards.name: The Pereghost
cards.text: All the pereghost's allies gain 2 levels.

cards.name: Bruenor Battlehammer
cards.text: Bruenor gains 2 levels when fighting a monster.

cards.name: Marco Volo
cards.text: At the start of the player's turn, he can look at the top card of any draw pile and discard it if he wants.

cards.name: The Harpers
cards.text: The Harpers can cast wizard and cleric spells, but the player must choose one type (wizard or cleric) in each battle when this card is used.

cards.name: Adventurers!
cards.text: Can use cleric and wizard spells.

cards.name: Crime Lord
cards.text: The Crime Lord can also be played as an event to destroy one holding. The destroyed holding and the Crime Lord are discarded.

cards.name: Adventurers
cards.text: All allies of these adventurers gain 1 level.

cards.name: The Jotunslayers
cards.text: The Jotunslayers are level 8 if the opposing champion is a monster.

cards.name: Myrmidons
cards.text: When the myrmidons are discarded, the player shuffles all discards back into the draw deck.

cards.name: Pteranadon
cards.text: The Pteranadon gains 3 levels when defending Chult.

cards.name: Gorgosaurus
cards.text: The Gorgosaurus gains 3 levels when defending Chult.

cards.name: Greater Feyr
cards.text: The first enemy ally played against the feyr in each battle is discarded immediately.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/402.

cards.name: Cleric of Mask
cards.text: This card and attached magical items and artifact are kept face down, and revealed only in battle.

cards.name: Drow Matron
cards.text: The drow matron gains 3 levels when defending Menzoberranzan.

cards.name: Dracolich
cards.text: Can use wizard spells. Undead. Flyer.

cards.name: Vasos Flameslayer
cards.text: Vasos gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

cards.name: Allisa of the Mist
cards.text: Allisa gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

cards.name: Worden Ironfist
cards.text: Worden gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

cards.name: Amarill
cards.text: If Amarill is defeated, the player can pull one other champion from his discards and return it to his hand.

cards.name: Joliet the Rash
cards.text: Once in play, must attack on the player's turn, every turn, or be discarded.

cards.name: Dwarf of Earthfast
cards.text: Gains 4 levels if the opposing champion is a monster.

cards.name: The Black Courser
cards.text: The Black Courser's level is 8 when fighting dragons or undead.

cards.name: Mind Flayer
cards.text: When played, the mind flayer can immediately shift one opposing ally to its own side for that round of battle. The ally loses 1 level.

cards.name: Noble Djinni
cards.text: The opponent cannot play flyers this round and all opposing flyers already in the battle are discarded.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/405.

cards.name: Intellect Devourer
cards.text: Immediately destroys an opposing champion of level 5 or less. Count only magical item and artifact bonuses when determining level.

cards.name: Shandrill
cards.text: Immune to offensive spells.

cards.name: Triceratops
cards.text: Triceratops gains 6 levels when defending Chult.

cards.name: Cleric of Malar
cards.text: This cleric gains 2 levels when attacking realms from outside the Forgotten Realms.

cards.name: Airship
cards.text: Destroys any two allies, chosen by this card's player.

cards.name: Bad Omens
cards.text: All allies and champions lose one level until the player's next turn.

cards.name: Fortunate Omens
cards.text: All allies gain 3 levels until the player's next turn.

cards.name: Rod of Shapechange
cards.text: Select any champion from the discard pile and use it in battle in place of this champion. After winning the battle, this champion and artifact return to the pool; the substitute is discarded.

cards.name: Dwarven Hammer
cards.text: (Off)

cards.name: Staff of Striking
cards.text: The bonus becomes +5 levels if attached to a cleric. (Off)

cards.name: Horrors of the Abyss
cards.text: (Off/4)

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/408.

cards.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power
cards.text: (Off)

cards.name: Cataclysm!
cards.text: Destroys one realm of the player's choice; that realm is discarded.

cards.name: Good Fortune
cards.text: The player of this card draws five cards immediately.

cards.name: Surprise Raid
cards.text: This player's champion and allies are doubled in levels for one round of battle.

cards.name: Banner of the One-Eyed God
cards.text: All of this champion's allies gain 1 level. (Def)

cards.name: Viperhand
cards.text: Any champion with the Viperhand can cast wizard spells. (Def)

cards.name: Orb of Doom
cards.text: (Off)

cards.name: Staff of Conjuring
cards.text: (Off)

cards.name: Spell of Formless Horror
cards.text: Cast on opposing champion to reduce its level by 3. Spell remains until dispelled. (Off/4)

cards.name: Safe Harbor!
cards.text: Every player can immediately rebuild one razed realm.

cards.name: Labor of Legend
cards.text: One razed realm is rebuilt by a champion from the player's pool; the champion is discarded.

cards.name: Wand of Light
cards.text: (Off)

cards.name: The Free City of Greyhawk
cards.text: Any champion defending Greyhawk can cast cleric and wizard spells.

cards.name: The Lands of Iuz
cards.text: Any champion defending the Lands of Iuz can cast wizard spells. All defenders gain 3 levels if anyone has Iuz in play.

cards.name: The Pomarj
cards.text: A monster defending the Pomarj gains 3 levels.

cards.name: Hold of the Sea Princes
cards.text: This realm can defend itself as a level 1 champion.

cards.name: Blackmoor
cards.text: All magical items and artifacts defending Blackmoor gain 2 levels.

cards.name: Sterich
cards.text: Any monster defending Sterich gains 5 levels.

cards.name: Veluna
cards.text: Any champion defending Veluna can use cleric spells.

cards.name: The Great Kingdom
cards.text: No undead can attack the Great Kingdom. The player's maximum hand increases by two.

cards.name: Temple of Elemental Evil
cards.text: Draw three cards immediately when the temple is played.

cards.name: Greyhawk Ruins
cards.text: All Greyhawk champions of this player gain 2 levels.

cards.name: The Bright Desert
cards.text: Cannot be attacked by heroes.

cards.name: The Bone March
cards.text: Heroes cannot be played in defense of this realm.

cards.name: The Sea Barons
cards.text: Any holding attached to the Great Kingdom also applies to this realm.

cards.name: Bissel
cards.text: Any champion can use cleric spells while defending Bissel.

cards.name: The Scarlet Brotherhood
cards.text: Player can eliminate one champion from any pool at the start of his turn. This realm is then razed.

cards.name: Irongate
cards.text: Any defending hero gains 4 levels.

cards.name: Burneal Forest
cards.text: Any champion and allies who attack Burneal Forest lose 2 levels.

cards.name: Castle Hart
cards.text: Any champion and allies defending Castle Hart gain 2 levels.

cards.name: Arms of the Horned Society
cards.text: The attached realm can defend itself as a level 5 hero.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/401.

cards.name: Arms of Greyhawk
cards.text: No Greyhawk realms with holdings, of any player, can be attacked by monsters or flyers.

cards.name: Arms of the Great Kingdom
cards.text: All undead allies of this player are doubled in level, whether attacking or defending.

cards.name: Arms of Furyondy
cards.text: The attached realm is unaffected by all harmful event cards.

cards.name: Arms of Nyrond
cards.text: Monsters cannot attack the attached realm.

cards.name: Skull Keep
cards.text: Any champion defending the attached realm gains 4 levels.

cards.name: Fortification
cards.text: The attached realm and all its defenders are immune to offensive wizard and cleric spells.

cards.name: Siege!
cards.text: Razes the first realm of every player, regardless of special powers; if a player's first realm is already razed, he ignores this event.

cards.name: Selune
cards.text: Undead cannot attack the attached realm.

cards.name: Peasant Militia
cards.text: Each champion and ally attacking the attached realm loses 1 level.

cards.name: Alias the Sell-Sword
cards.text: Immune to offensive spells.

cards.name: King Azoun IV
cards.text: All allies of King Azoun IV gain 1 level.

cards.name: Maligor the Red
cards.text: Once per battle Maligor can shift one opposing ally to his own side.

cards.name: Elminster the Mage
cards.text: Immune to offensive spells.

cards.name: Drizzt Do' Urden
cards.text: Elf (drow). When defending, Drizzt must be defeated twice in one battle before he is discarded.

cards.name: Midnight, Goddess of Magic
cards.text: If only one Midnight is in play, wizards cannot cast spells without her permission. She also destroys all magical items held by the opposing champion.

cards.name: Torg Mac Cei, the Ironlord
cards.text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. Torg's level is doubled when defending or attacking the Great Rift.

cards.name: The Pereghost
cards.text: All the pereghost's allies gain 2 levels.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/422.

cards.name: Marco Volo
cards.text: At the start of the player's turn, he can look at the top card of any draw pile and discard it if he wants.

cards.name: The Harpers
cards.text: The Harpers can cast wizard and cleric spells, but the player must choose one type (wizard or cleric) in each battle when this card is used.

cards.name: Gnomes of Samek
cards.text: Gnome. Earthwalker. The gnomes' armor gives them the ability to ignore one ally, magical item, or offensive spell each round.

cards.name: Adventurers!
cards.text: Can use cleric and wizard spells.

cards.name: War Party
cards.text: If more than two of this card are involved in one round of combat (on either side), each war party receives an additional +4 for each war party in play. No limit per deck.

cards.name: Crime Lord
cards.text: The Crime Lord can also be played as an event to destroy one holding. The destroyed holding and the Crime Lord are discarded.

cards.name: Adventurers
cards.text: All allies of these adventurers gain 1 level.

cards.name: The Jotunslayers
cards.text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. The Jotunslayers are level 8 if the opposing champion is a monster.

cards.name: Armies of Bloodstone
cards.text: This ally can "save" a champion - the player can withdraw his champion from combat and continue with a new one (allies and spells are discarded). The "rescued" champion cannot attack or defend until this player's next turn.

cards.name: The Iron Legion
cards.text: This ally instills fear in all opposing heroes, reducing their base level to 0 in battle.

cards.name: Tergoz Tenhammer
cards.text: Tergoz's mighty hammer has slayed ten men with one blow! Allies are so terrified they cannot be played against Tergoz.

cards.name: Myrmidons
cards.text: When the myrmidons are discarded, the player shuffles all discards back into the draw deck.

cards.name: The Magister
cards.text: Immune to psionicists. The magister and all attached items can be moved from the player's pool to his hand during his phase 5.

cards.name: King Havlor II
cards.text: The king has a permanent +5 magical item (flaming sword) attached to him that cannot be removed by any means.

cards.name: Pteranadon
cards.text: The Pteranadon gains 3 levels when defending Chult.

cards.name: Gorgosaurus
cards.text: The Gorgosaurus gains 3 levels when defending Chult.

cards.name: Greater Feyr
cards.text: The first enemy ally played against the feyr in each battle is discarded immediately.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 2nd/402.

cards.name: Cleric of Torm
cards.text: May be discarded at any time from a player's pool to eliminate any ally from play.

cards.name: Cleric of Mask
cards.text: This card and attached magical items and artifact are kept face down, and revealed only in battle.

cards.name: Drow Matron
cards.text: Elf (drow). The drow matron gains 3 levels when defending Menzoberranzan.

cards.name: Dracolich
cards.text: Can use wizard spells. Undead. Flyer.

cards.name: Vasos Flameslayer
cards.text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. Vasos gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

cards.name: Allisa of the Mist
cards.text: Allisa gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

cards.name: Grypht the Saurial
cards.text: Negates the levels and special powers of all offensive magical items of less than +4 enchantment.

cards.name: Worden Ironfist
cards.text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. Worden gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

cards.name: Amarill
cards.text: If Amarill is defeated, the player can pull one other champion from his discards and return it to his hand.

cards.name: Joliet the Rash
cards.text: Once in play, Joliet must attack each turn, if possible, or be discarded. If victorious when attacking, Joliet gets a spoils of victory, even if a realm is not raised.

cards.name: Dwarf of Earthfast
cards.text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. Gains 4 levels if the opposing champion is a monster.

cards.name: The Black Courser
cards.text: The Black Courser's level is 8 when fighting dragons or undead.

cards.name: Hornhead Saurial
cards.text: The attached champion and all his allies are immune to magical items of +3 or less.

cards.name: Dagrande
cards.text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. Particularly proud of his ability to cleave through an opponent, Dagrande gets twice as many spoils of victory is victorious.

cards.name: Mind Flayer
cards.text: When played, the mind flayer can immediately shift one opposing ally to its own side for that round of battle. The ally loses 1 level.

cards.name: Noble Djinni
cards.text: The opponent cannot play flyers this round and all opposing flyers already in the battle are discarded.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 2nd/405.

cards.name: Intellect Devourer
cards.text: Immediately destroys an opposing champion of base level 5 or less.

cards.name: Shandrill
cards.text: Immune to offensive spells.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/423.

cards.name: Cleric of Malar
cards.text: This cleric gains 2 levels when attacking realms from outside the Forgotten Realms.

cards.name: Airship
cards.text: Destroys any two allies, chosen by this card's player; choice does not have to be immediate. (Harmful)

cards.name: Bad Omens
cards.text: All champions and allies, other than the event player's, lose 2 levels until the player's next turn. (Harmful)

cards.name: Fortunate Omens
cards.text: This player's allies gain 3 levels until his next turn. (Helpful)

cards.name: Rod of Shapechange
cards.text: Select any champion from the discard pile and use it in battle in place of this champion. After winning the battle, this champion and artifact return to the pool; the substitute is discarded.

cards.name: Dwarven Hammer
cards.text: The mighty hammer of the dwarves slays any giant opposing the attached champion. (Off)

cards.name: Staff of Striking
cards.text: The bonus becomes +5 levels if attached to a cleric. (Off)

cards.name: Horrors of the Abyss
cards.text: After the round of battle is concluded (win or lose), this spell and the opposing champion are sent to the Abyss. (Off/4/5)

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 2nd/408.

cards.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power
cards.text: The bearer is immune to psionic attacks. If on the losing side of a battle, he can eliminate one magical item in play. (Off)

cards.name: Cataclysm!
cards.text: Destroys one realm of the player's choice; that realm is discarded. (Harmful)

cards.name: Good Fortune
cards.text: The player of this card draws five cards immediately.

cards.name: Surprise Raid
cards.text: This player's champion and allies are doubled in levels for one round of battle.

cards.name: Banner of the One-Eyed God
cards.text: All of this champion's allies gain 1 level. (Def)

cards.name: Viperhand
cards.text: Any champion with the Viperhand can cast wizard spells. (Def)

cards.name: Orb of Doom
cards.text: The attached champion can attack again this round if victorious. If he razes a realm, the champion and all attachments are discarded. (Def)

cards.name: Staff of Conjuring
cards.text: Can retrieve an ally from the discard pile during each battle the attached champion is in. If defeated, the staff is broken and sent to the Abyss. (Def)

cards.name: Spell of Formless Horror
cards.text: Cast on opposing champion to reduce its level by 3. Spell remains until dispelled. (Off/3/4/5)

cards.name: Safe Harbor!
cards.text: Every player can immediately rebuild one razed realm.

cards.name: Labor of Legend
cards.text: One razed realm is rebuilt by a champion from the player's pool; the champion is discarded.

cards.name: Wand of Light
cards.text: Any undead, werecreature, or vampire loses 2 levels against the wand. (Off)

cards.name: Elf Galleon
cards.text: Flyer. Swimmer. All allies played after the elf galleon in this battle are also flyers and swimmers.

cards.name: The Free City of Greyhawk
cards.text: Any champion defending Greyhawk can cast cleric and wizard spells.

cards.name: The Lands of Iuz
cards.text: Any champion defending the Lands of Iuz can cast wizard spells. All defenders gain 3 levels if anyone has Iuz in play.

cards.name: The Pomarj
cards.text: A monster defending the Pomarj gains 3 levels.

cards.name: Hold of the Sea Princes
cards.text: This realm can defend itself as a level 1 champion.

cards.name: The Yeomanry
cards.text: Earthwalkers gain 2 levels when defending the Yeomanry.

cards.name: Blackmoor
cards.text: All magical items and artifacts defending Blackmoor gain 2 levels.

cards.name: The Horned Society
cards.text: At the start of this player's turn, send one champion to Limbo until the end of that player's next turn.

cards.name: The Wolf Nomads
cards.text: The Wolf Nomads are immune to the power of Iuz the Evil. But they are fearful of dragons, and dragons gain 1 level when attacking this realm.

cards.name: Sterich
cards.text: Any monster defending Sterich gains 5 levels.

cards.name: Nyrond
cards.text: Elves, gnomes, and halflings gain 3 levels when defending Nyrond.

cards.name: Veluna
cards.text: Any champion defending Veluna can use cleric spells.

cards.name: Furyondy
cards.text: When first played, Furyondy can remove one wizard from play (the wizard is discarded).

cards.name: The Great Kingdom
cards.text: No undead can attack the Great Kingdom. The player's maximum hand increases by two.

cards.name: Temple of Elemental Evil
cards.text: Draw three cards immediately when the temple is played.

cards.name: Greyhawk Ruins
cards.text: All Greyhawk champions of this player gain 2 levels.

cards.name: Perrenland
cards.text: Maximum hand size for all opposing players is reduced by one.

cards.name: Keoland
cards.text: Can defend itself as a level 0 hero and use allies and magical items. If this hero successfully defends the realm, he can keep one ally or magical item.

cards.name: Celene
cards.text: Monsters cannot attack or defend Celene. Elves gain 2 levels when defending this realm.

cards.name: The Bright Desert
cards.text: Cannot be attacked by heroes.

cards.name: Theocracy of the Pale
cards.text: Clerics refuse to attack the Theocracy; clerics who defend the realm, however, double their base level.

cards.name: The Bone March
cards.text: Heroes cannot be played in defense of this realm. Undead defenders gain 4 levels.

cards.name: The Duchy of Urnst
cards.text: The naval fleet of the duchy is so powerful that the realm is immune to swimmers.

cards.name: The Sea Barons
cards.text: Any holding attached to the Great Kingdom also applies to this realm.

cards.name: Hookhill
cards.text: This player's Greyhawk realms are immune to offensive spells and harmful events if Bissel is also in play anywhere.

cards.name: The Scarlet Brotherhood
cards.text: Player can eliminate one champion from any pool at the start of his turn. This realm is then razed.

cards.name: Iron Hills
cards.text: This player's Geryhawk champions are immune to offensive spells and harmful events if Irongate is also in play anywhere.

cards.name: Principality of Ulek
cards.text: This realm has coastal fortifications and is immune to all swimmers.

cards.name: County of Sunndi
cards.text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending the County of Sunndi; spells are doubled in level.

cards.name: Duchy of Tenh
cards.text: If Menzoberranzan is played or razed while this realm is in play, this player draws 3 cards.

cards.name: Burneal Forest
cards.text: Any champion and allies who attack Burneal Forest lose 2 levels.

cards.name: Castle Hart
cards.text: Any champion and allies defending Castle Hart gain 2 levels.

cards.name: Ancient Arms of the Horned Society
cards.text: This player's Greyhawk monsters all have the ability to earthwalk, as do their allies.

cards.name: (no card)

cards.text: If Iuz the Evil is in play, this player's undead are doubled in base level.

cards.text: All undead allies of this player are tripled in level, when attacking or defending.

cards.name: Ancient Arms of Furyondy
cards.text: The attached realm deflects all offensive spells and harmful events directed at it to any other realm of the player's choice.

cards.name: Ancient Arms of Nyrond
cards.text: This player's monsters have the ability to fly, swim, or earthwalk as needed.

cards.name: Skull Keep
cards.text: Any champion defending the attached realm gains 4 levels.

cards.name: Fortification
cards.text: The attached realm and all its defenders are immune to offensive wizard and cleric spells.

cards.text: Razes the first realm of every player, regardless of special powers; if a player's first realm is already razed, he ignores this event. (Harmful)

cards.text: Every champion and ally of this player gains 1 level. (Def)

cards.text: All of this player's champions are immune to offensive magical items and spells. (Def)

cards.text: The champion who holds this crystal must attack on his turn or be discarded. (Off)

cards.name: Lich Conclave

cards.name: Mordenkainen

cards.name: Iuz the Evil

cards.name: Quagmiela the Dragon
cards.text: Alone of monsters, Quagmiela can stand against the Lovely Colleen (perhaps because he attacks from behind); combat is resolved normally.

cards.text: Replaced by 2nd/410.

cards.text: This ally negates the special power of one ally (chosen by this player).

cards.name: South Ledopolus

cards.text: Any champion defending the attached realm can cast cleric spells.

cards.name: Mekillot

cards.name: Salt View
cards.text: Defending champion gains 2 levels.

cards.text: Replaced by 2nd/404.

cards.text: Replaced by 1st/440.

cards.name: Yaramuke

cards.text: If the attached realm is razed, one other opponent's realm of the defender's choice is razed also.

cards.name: Bitter Well
cards.text: This oasis destroys any flyers that attack the attached realm.

cards.name: Black Waters
cards.text: No werecreature or monster can attack any realm held by this player.

cards.name: Fort Melidor
cards.text: Allies defending any Dark Sun realm held by this player are doubled in level.

cards.name: Dungeon of Gulg

cards.text: If this card is on the losing side of a battle, all holdings of the opponent are discarded.

cards.name: Halfling Mercenaries

cards.name: War Band
cards.text: +8 vs. undead.

cards.name: Kank Lancers
cards.text: All opposing swimmers (champions and allies) are discarded immediately; no more can be played against it.

cards.name: Nomad Mercenaries

cards.name: Gladiators
cards.text: If played with a Dark Sun champion, the gladiators remain with that champion until he is defeated or discarded.

cards.name: Rikus

cards.name: Neeva

cards.name: Sadira
cards.text: Sadira can use any psionic power. Psionicists must ask her permission to use psionic powers, though they can still use their stated special abilities.

cards.name: Agis
cards.text: When attacking, can psionically destroy one monster in the defender's pool before battle begins.

cards.name: Vaerhirmana

cards.name: Azhul the Hasty
cards.text: Azhul may attack with new allies as many times as he wants every turn until he razes a realm or is defeated.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 2nd/416.

cards.text: Once during each combat round, Bagual can retrieve and cast a cleric spell from this player's draw pile. Reshuffle the pile after each turn.

cards.name: Rowan
cards.text: Elf. Rowan can send one opposing ally or magical item to the Abyss.

cards.name: Shayira
cards.text: Negates the special powers (but not the bonuses) of all cards played against her.

cards.name: Ashathra
cards.text: Can be discarded at any time to discard one opposing ally.

cards.name: Stug
cards.text: If on the losing side of a battle, Stug can rob a victorious player of his spoils of victory by allowing a player not invloved in the battle to draw spoils instead.

cards.name: Ka'Cha
cards.text: Negates the power of all +1 or +2 allies played against him.

cards.name: Galek
cards.text: Can draw a card from the opposing player's draw pile, playing it on this player's side if applicable, otherwise discarding it.

cards.name: Wind Dancers
cards.text: All flyers in play are destroyed immediately. (Harmful)

cards.name: Water Hunters
cards.text: All undead in play are destroyed immediately. (Harmful)

cards.name: Silver Hands' Revenge
cards.text: This player's champions killed in the last battle are restored to his pool. Play only after a battle is completely resolved. (Helpful)

cards.name: Sky Singers
cards.text: Destroys all magical items in play. (Harmful)

cards.name: Silt Stalkers
cards.text: If on the losing side of a battle, all magical items in play are shuffled back into the draw pile.

cards.name: Night Runners
cards.text: Elves. If on the winning side of a battle, this player can choose one magical item, artifact, or rule card in play anywhere to be discarded.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/430.

cards.name: Cistern Fiend
cards.text: Immune to offensive and defensive spells. Enemy allies cannot be used against this fiend.

cards.name: Sloth
cards.text: When played in battle, the opposing player must immediately discard one card from his hand.

cards.name: Mul Savage
cards.text: Immune to offensive and defensive magical items.

cards.name: Inhuman
cards.text: Attached champion and allies are immune to ally powers for this round of combat.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/431.

cards.name: Cha'thrang
cards.text: All nonflying allies opposing the Cha'thrnag lose 4 levels.

cards.name: Spirit of the land
cards.text: Prevents one Dark Sun realm or holding from being razed or discarded, or restores one razed realm from any world. An attacker gets no spoils of victory and the battle is over. (Helpful)

cards.name: Thri-kreen
cards.text: All nonhuman allies (elves, dwarves, and halflings) lose 2 levels for fear of the thri-kreen.

cards.name: Wijon
cards.text: Wijon can double the level of one ally played after him (choice need not be immediate).

cards.name: Mikor
cards.text: If on the losing side of a battle, Mikor transfers all non-event cards in this player's Abyss to his discard pile.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/432.

cards.name: Zurn
cards.text: Zurn can ally himself with any victorious champion, returning with that champion to the pool.

cards.name: Powell
cards.text: Powell can be discarded to the Abyss during phase 3 to retrieve a magical item.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/433.

cards.name: Wachter
cards.text: Wachter's bonus increases to +8 if played from 6 am to 6 pm.

cards.name: Foucault
cards.text: Elf. Foucault and all other attached cards are immune to all spells and magical items with the words "fire" or "flame" in their title.

cards.name: Stef'fa Naf'ski
cards.text: Psionically negates the special power of an opposing champion in battle. If defeated, he negates the special power of a champion in any pool until Dispel Magic is cast on the affected champion.

cards.name: Captain Kazhal
cards.text: Destroys one magical item held by the opposing champion at any time during the battle round.

cards.name: Dlasva
cards.text: Dlasva can psionically destroy one opposing ally during a round of battle.

cards.name: Tithian
cards.text: If Tithian attacks and wins a round of battle, the defending realm is razed immediately.

cards.name: Verrasi
cards.text: No magical items with a bonus greater than +3 can be played after Verrasi joins the battle.

cards.name: Rogue Defiler of Tyr
cards.text: Each time the defiler casts a spell during combat, her player discards one card from his hand and draws a replacement from his draw pile.

cards.name: The Lion of Urik
cards.text: Can cast wizard spells and use psionic powers. Immune to psionic attack.

cards.name: Borys the Dragon
cards.text: Flyer. Can cast wizard and cleric spells and use psionic powers. Immune to psionic attack.

cards.name: Preserver
cards.text: If defeated by a Dark Sun champion, the preserver is sent to Limbo until his end of this player's next turn, when he returns to his pool.

cards.name: Punisher
cards.text: If on the losing side of a battle, the punisher returns to the player's hand instead of being discarded.

cards.name: Gith
cards.text: If two gith are played in the same round of combat, each increases to a +7.

cards.name: Tiger
cards.text: If played during defense, the shape-changed druid remains with the realm until it is razed.

cards.name: Orb of Power
cards.text: Offensive spells and magical items have no affect against the champion with this orb. (Def)

cards.name: Ring of All Seeing
cards.text: Allows the owning player, at the beginning of his turn, to look at one player's hand. (Def)

cards.name: Treasure
cards.text: All monsters are bribed to desert; discard all monsters in battle or in pools. (Harmful)

cards.name: Shield of Destruction
cards.text: Absorbs the effects of one offensive spell played against the attached champion (this player's choice) once per turn. (Def)

cards.name: Shield of Annihilation
cards.text: Instantly annihilates one opposing enemy ally played against the attached champion (this player's choice). (off)

cards.name: Shield of Devastation
cards.text: Negates the power of one offensive magical item used against the attached champion (this player's choice), once per turn. (Off)

cards.name: Shield of Wickedness
cards.text: One enemy ally, chosen by the shield's owner, is forced to switch sides and fight for the shield's owner for one round of battle. (Off)

cards.name: Shield of Gore
cards.text: Allies of less than +4 cannot be played against the attached champion, and allies of +1 or +2 currently in battle are discarded. (Off)

cards.name: The Heartwood Spear
cards.text: Kills any opposing dragon or monster in the battle automatically.

cards.name: The Caravan
cards.text: Play only between two player's turns. The player of this event can take a turn immediately. Afterward, play continues where it left off. (Helpful)

cards.name: The Necklace
cards.text: Allows the attached champion to cast wizard spells and confers immunity to psionic powers. (Def)

cards.name: Elemental Cleric
cards.text: The elemental cleric is immune to offensive wizard spells.

cards.name: Elven Archer
cards.text: The elven archer's skill with the bow is such that it can kill, instantly, one enemy ally of its choice.

cards.name: The Outcast
cards.text: Can use cleric or wizard spells.

cards.name: Thugs
cards.text: Can be attached to any realm during phase 3 as a permanent ally.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/434.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 2nd/417.

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/435.

cards.name: Marauder
cards.text: Can be discarded at any time to negate an event created by using the Bell of Might.

cards.name: Shaqat Beetles
cards.text: If defeated in combat, these parasites attach themselves to the victorious champion, reducing his level to 1.

cards.name: Tembo
cards.text: The opponent cannot use allies for defense or offense.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.text: Destroys immediately all opposing allies of level 4 or less. (Off/4)

cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.text: Immediately destroys one opposing ally of level 4 or less, or one magical item, of caster's choice. (Off/4)

cards.name: Paralyze
cards.text: Cast on a champion before battle to prevent that card from defending. Cast during a battle to eliminate one ally of the caster's choice. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Magic Missile
cards.text: (Off/4)

cards.name: Wall of Fire
cards.text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. (Off/4)

cards.name: Wall of Iron
cards.text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. Use on defense only. (Def/4)

cards.name: Wall of Stone
cards.text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. Use on defense only. (Def/4)

cards.name: Wall of Force
cards.text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. (Def/4)

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 2nd/418.

cards.name: Cone of Cold
cards.text: Destroys one artifact, chosen by the caster. (Off/4)

cards.name: Sleep
cards.text: Eliminates up to three opposing allies of level 1 or 2, chosen by the caster. Can be cast during any battle, including those between opponents. (Off)

cards.name: Shield
cards.text: Negates the Magic Missile spell. (Def/4)

cards.name: Fly
cards.text: One champion and/or ally becomes a flyer. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Crushing Fist
cards.text: The crushing fist adds 4 levels or destroys one magical item, at the choice of the caster. (Off/4)

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 2nd/420.

cards.name: Dispel Magic
cards.text: Can be cast at any time to cancel the effects of a just-cast spell or to cancel an existing spell. (Def)

cards.name: Improved Phantasmal Force
cards.text: If cast by an undead champion, he can bypass a defending wizard or cleric and raze the realm. The defending champion returns to his pool. (Def/4)

cards.name: Fear
cards.text: Attach to any enemy champion in a pool; that card cannot attack or defend until the fear is dispelled. (Off/3)

cards.name: Cure Light Wounds
cards.text: Can be cast to retrieve an ally of level 1 or 2 who was discarded during this battle. (Def/4/5)

cards.name: Cure Serious Wounds
cards.text: Can be cast to retrieve an ally of level 3 or 4 who was discarded buring this combat. (Def/4/5)

cards.name: Sticks to Snakes
cards.text: Increases to +6 if cast by a level 7 or 8 champion, and increases to +8 if cast by a level 9 or higher champion. (Off/4)

cards.name: Blade Barrier
cards.text: Destroys all opposing allies of level 5 or less. Cast only when defending. (Off/4)

cards.name: Bless
cards.text: The champion and each of its allies gain 1 level this round. (Def/4)

cards.name: Sanctuary
cards.text: The cleric who casts sanctuary loses this round of battle but is not discarded; it returns to the pool instead. (Def/4)

cards.name: Wind Walk
cards.text: The champion and all his allies this round are treated as flyers. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Bark Skin
cards.text: Adds 2 levels to a single defender. (Def/4)

cards.name: Charm
cards.text: Opponent loses one ally of the caster's choice, chosen immediately. (Off/4)

cards.name: Dispel Magic
cards.text: Can be cast at any time to cancel the effects of a just-cast spell or to cancel an existing spell. (Def)

cards.name: Darkness
cards.text: This battle ends immediately with no victor or loser; champions return to their pools, allies to the players' hands, spells are discarded. Darkness has no effect against monsters. (Def/4)

cards.name: Protection
cards.text: The opponent cannot use undead in this battle round; any already played as allies are discarded. An undead champion loses the battle but returns to the pool. (Def/4)

cards.name: Chariot of Sustarre
cards.text: One champion or two allies can fly for one round of battle. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/436.

cards.name: Wall of Thorns
cards.text: Cast only when defending. Only attackers of level 3 or higher can cross the wall. (Def/4)

cards.name: Wall of Fire
cards.text: Cast only when defending. Only attackers of level 4 or higher can cross the wall. (Off/4)

cards.name: Holy Word
cards.text: Destroys all undead allies on both sides of a battle instantly. (Off/4)

cards.name: Raise Dead
cards.text: Any one defeated champion can be selected from the player's discard pile and placed back in his hand. (Def/3/5)

cards.name: Flame Strike
cards.text: Destroys any number of opposing allies with levels totaling 6 or less, selected by the caster. Discard immediately. (Off/4)

cards.name: Protection from Lightning
cards.text: Lightning cannot harm the caster or his allies in this battle. (Def/4)

cards.name: Silence
cards.text: The opposing champion cannot cast any spells in this battle. (Off/4)

cards.name: Improved Invisibility to Undead
cards.text: If on the losing side of a battle with an undead, this champion can slip by and return to his pool. He is not defeated, and may defend or attack again this battle. (Def/4)

cards.name: Wall of Fog
cards.text: No attacks are allowed against any player until the caster's next turn. (Off/3)

cards.name: Forget
cards.text: One ally 'forgets' to attack or defend this turn; discard the ally. (Off/4)

cards.name: Web
cards.text: Destroys any opposing allies of level 3 or less already in play. (Off/4)

cards.name: Blink
cards.text: A champion who is about to lose a round of battle escapes to the player's pool, but the battle is still lost. (Def/4)

cards.name: Hold Undead
cards.text: Opposing undead allies have no effect on the outcome of this battle. (Off/4)

cards.name: Charm Monster
cards.text: An opposing monster returns to its pool; the caster wins this round of battle. (Off/4)

cards.name: Wind of Disenchantment
cards.text: An antimagic storm sweeps across the cosmos, destroying all magical items in play. (Harmful)

cards.name: Black Tentacles
cards.text: All champions of base level 4 or less die, regardless of whether they are in battle or in pools. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Fire Shield
cards.text: The caster and his allies are immune to all spells with the words "fire" or "flame" in the name. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Ice Storm
cards.text: Destroys all champions and allies of level 4 or less in play anywhere. (Harmful)

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 2nd/419.

cards.name: Solid Fog
cards.text: Unearthly fog prevents all attacks against all players until this player's next turn. (Harmful)

cards.name: Animate Dead
cards.text: A wizard who casts this spell can fight again in the next round of battle, regardless of whether he won or lost the previous round. (Def/4)

cards.name: Cloudkill
cards.text: Opposing allies of level 3 or less are discarded and no more can be played this round. (Off/4)

cards.name: Feebleminded
cards.text: An opposing spellcaster cannot cast any spells for the rest of this round. (Off/4)

cards.name: Magic Jar
cards.text: If the defender is defeated, the current attacking champion becomes the defending champion in the next round of this battle and then is discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound
cards.text: After an opponent puts forward a champion in attack, this player's hound sounds a warning. The defender can put his champion on the battlefield first (thus activation his special powers first). (Helpful)

cards.name: Passwall
cards.text: Negates any wall spell. (Def/4)

cards.name: Rock to Mud
cards.text: Only flyers can attack this player's realms until the player's next turn. (Def/4)

cards.name: Chain Lightning
cards.text: This spell's bonus increases to +7 if cast by a champion of level 7 or higher. (Off/4)

cards.name: Death Fog
cards.text: Kills all champions of level 5 or less in one player's pool and prevents survivors from attacking until after that player's next turn. (Off/3)

cards.name: Death Spell
cards.text: Kills any one champion or ally of the caster's choosing of level 7 or less. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 1st/437.

cards.name: Geas
cards.text: The affected champion can neither attack nor defend until after the owner's next turn. (Off/3)

cards.name: Banishment
cards.text: Destroys one monster of the caster's choice. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Control Undead
cards.text: The caster can ask any player for his largest undead ally card and use it in this round of battle. The ally is discarded afterward. (Off/4)

cards.name: Finger of Death
cards.text: Kills any one champion or ally of level 5 or less. (Off/4)

cards.name: Spell Turning
cards.text: Can be cast at any time to turn a just-cast spell back at its caster, as if the original target had cast it. (Def)

cards.name: (no card)
cards.text: Replaced by 2nd/409.

cards.name: Calm
cards.text: This magical calm undoes the harmful effect of an event, but only for the player of this card. (Helpful)

cards.name: Menzoberranzan
cards.text: Menzoberranzan can be played at any time. The realm is immune to flyers.

cards.name: Ruins of Zhentil Keep
cards.text: The Ruins of Zhentil Keep can be attacked only by clerics. It can defend itself as a level 5 monster.

cards.name: Sembia
cards.text: Attacking players must discard a card from their hand or pool for each champion sent forward.

cards.name: Myth Drannor
cards.text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Myth Drannor. Increases this player's maximum hand size by one.

cards.name: Icewind Dale
cards.text: The attacking champion must discard one magical item chosen by the defender.

cards.name: Damara
cards.text: Doubles the level of a defending Forgotten Realms champion as he is sent forward; cards subsequently played are not doubled.

cards.name: Daggerdale
cards.text: Allies cannot be used when attacking Daggerdale.

cards.name: Evermeet
cards.text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Evermeet. Flyers, swimmers, and earthwalkers cannot attack this realm.

cards.name: The Trollmoors
cards.text: The Trollmoors regenerate and must be defeated twice in one turn before being razed.

cards.name: The Coral Kingdom
cards.text: The Coral Kingdom can be attacked only by swimmers.

cards.name: Raurin
cards.text: If Raurin is razed, the attacking champion must be discarded.

cards.name: The Vilhon Reach
cards.text: If the Vilhon Reach is razed, this player can discard one razed realm from another player's formation.

cards.name: Giant's Run Mountains
cards.text: The Giant's Run Mountains can be attacked only by flyers or giants. Its defenders are immune to offensive unarmed combat cards.

cards.name: Sterich
cards.text: Any monster defending Sterich gains 5 levels.

cards.name: Nyrond
cards.text: Elves, dwarves, gnomes, and halflings gain 3 levels when defending Nyrond.

cards.name: Furyondy
cards.text: When first played, Furyondy can remove one wizard from play (the wizard is discarded).

cards.name: Temple of Elemental Evil
cards.text: Draw three cards immediately when the Temple is played.

cards.name: Greyhawk Ruins
cards.text: All Greyhawk champions of this player gain 2 levels.

cards.name: Perrenland
cards.text: Maximum hand size for all opposing players is reduced by one.

cards.name: Duchy of Tenh
cards.text: If Menzoberranzan is played or razed while the Duchy of Tenh is in play, this player draws three cards.

cards.name: Hell Furnaces
cards.text: The level of any dragon defending the Hell Furnaces is doubled. Swimmers cannot attack this realm.

cards.name: Free and Independent City of Dyvers
cards.text: This realm allows the player to trade up to 3 realms and/or champions from his hand for an equal number of cards from his draw pile during phase 0. The realm is then razed.

cards.name: Spindrift Isles
cards.text: The Spindrift Isles can be attacked only by flyers or swimmers. It can defend itself as a level 8 elf wizard.

cards.name: Stonefist Hold
cards.text: Any hero defending Stonefist Hold gains 4 levels. This realm may be razed to prevent another player from gaining an extra turn.

cards.name: Ull
cards.text: When other players draw extra cards through events, this player can examine the extra cards and discard one.

cards.name: Valley of the Mage
cards.text: Monsters cannot attack the Valley of the Mage. This realm can defend itself as a level 9 wizard.

cards.name: Urik
cards.text: Allies cannot attack Urik. This realm can defend itself as a level 4 hero.

cards.name: Tyr
cards.text: Tyr's player draws one extra card per turn. This realm can defend itself as a level 5 hero.

cards.name: Gulg
cards.text: The first ally to attack Gulg each battle is destroyed. Gulg can defend itself as a level 7 hero.

cards.name: Euripis
cards.text: Only champions able to cast spells can attack Euripis. Swimmers cannot attack this realm.

cards.name: New Giustenal
cards.text: New Giustenal cannot be attacked by flyers (except Dregoth). If razed, this realm can be rebuilt by discarding only one card.

cards.name: Ur Draxa
cards.text: This player and his champions are immune to offensive psionic powers. Champions with attached artifacts or magical items cannot attack this realm, though they can be added during battle.

cards.name: Shault
cards.text: Shault can be attacked only by monsters or flyers. The realm can defend itself as a level 6 champion of any type, chosen by this player when attacked.

cards.name: The Forest Ridge
cards.text: If the Forest Ridge is razed through combat, the attacking champion is consumed by feral halflings and is discarded.

cards.name: Celik
cards.text: Champions attacking Celik must discard all attached magical items or artifacts (attacker's choice), and cannot add more of the type chosen during battle.

cards.name: Lake Island
cards.text: Lake Island can be attacked only by flyers or earthwalkers. It can defend itself as a level 5 monster.

cards.name: The Jagged Cliffs
cards.text: Any halflings played in defense of the Jagged Cliffs are tripled in base level. The realm can defend itself as a level 3 halfling hero.

cards.name: The Last Sea
cards.text: The Last Sea can be razed to act as a modified spell turning spell, redirecting any offensive spell to a target of this player's choice.

cards.name: Dragon's Crown Mountain
cards.text: All dragon champions of this player are immune to offensive spells and offensive psionic power cards. The realm can defend itself as a level 7 monster (dragon).

cards.name: Realm of the White Witch
cards.text: Monsters and wizards gain 3 levels when defending this realm. This player's champions are immune to the phase 0 special powers of realms.

cards.name: The Battle-Fens
cards.text: Spells and magical items cannot be used by a champion attacking the Battle-Fens. Spells and magical items used by defenders of this realm are doubled in level.

cards.name: The Giantdowns
cards.text: Giants defending this realm are doubled in base level. Monsters defending the Giantdowns gain 3 levels.

cards.name: The Sphinx
cards.text: This player may look at another player's hand once per turn.

cards.name: The Mistmoor
cards.text: The fogs of the Mistmoor are particularly dense, allowing a defeated defender to escape back to his pool with attachments, rather than being discarded.

cards.name: Tarvan Waste
cards.text: This realm can be sent to the Abyss from the formation to transfer all nonevent and nonchampion cards in the Abyss to the discard pile.

cards.name: Black Spear Tribes
cards.text: An attacking champion loses 1 level from his base level for each card attached to him and for each card he plays in battle. If his base level is reduced to 0, he is defeated and discarded.

cards.name: Thurazor
cards.text: Thurazor can defend itself as a level 7 monster. If the realm champion is defending, it may play the first card in defense, regardless of whether winning or losing.

cards.name: The Sielwode
cards.text: All spells, allies, psionic power cards, unarmed combat cards, and blood abilities used in the attack and defense of this realm are sent to the Abyss.

cards.name: The Five Peaks
cards.text: The Five Peaks can be attacked only by flyers or earthwalkers.

cards.name: Cariele
cards.text: Run by the guilds of the North to make a profit, Cariele increase this player's maximum hand size by three.

cards.name: Boeruine
cards.text: Any champion defending Boeruine can cast wizard spells and use blood abilities. This realm can defend itself as a level 6 regent.

cards.name: Rhuobhe
cards.text: When Rhuobhe is first played, this player can send any regent to the Abyss.

cards.name: Reorxcrown Mountains
cards.text: The Reorxcrown Mountains can be attacked only by flyers or dwarves and is immune to offensive wizard spells.

cards.name: Shining Lands
cards.text: The Shining Lands can be attacked only by flyers or earthwalkers. The realm and its defenders are immune to offensive spells.

cards.name: The Delving
cards.text: The Delving is home to a band of dwarves, who act as a +5 ally to any champion defending this realm. Because of the dwarves, the Delving is immune to attack via Underdark realms.

cards.name: Estwilde
cards.text: Flyers, swimmers, and earthwalkers who defend this realm are immune to offensive spells.

cards.name: Blood Sea of Istar
cards.text: Only swimmers can attack this realm. Its whirlpool destroys all swimming allies. Champions attacking via Underdark realms are halved in base level.

cards.name: Enstar
cards.text: At the heart of Enstar is a sinkhole. Defeated champions (whether attacking or defending) are sent to the Abyss. If this realm is razed, this player draws a card.

cards.name: Bluet Spur
cards.text: Bluet Spur cannot be attacked by flyers. It can defend itself as a level 6 monster that can cast wizard spells and use psionic power cards.

cards.name: Arak
cards.text: All drow defending Arak are immune to offensive spells, psionic power cards, and blood abilities. A +4 drow ally aids each defending champion.

cards.name: Borca
cards.text: A Ravenloft champion defending Borca may use any other Ravenloft champion as an ally. If the defense is successful, the ally-champion returns to his pool; otherwise, he is discarded.

cards.name: Gundarak
cards.text: The ghost of Lord Gundar, assassinated dark lord of Gundarak, haunts this realm, acting as a level 5 undead hero. Any allies played with him are considered undead.

cards.name: Sithicus
cards.text: Sithicus may be discarded from the formation during any combat where this realm is not involved to send all those currently in battle to the Abyss. This player then draws a card.

cards.name: Nightmare Lands
cards.text: Combat over the Nightmare Lands takes place in the Abyss, with each player using only the non-event cards contained there. The victor draws two spoils of victory, but must choose one to send to the Abyss.

cards.name: Council Aerie
cards.text: Dragon champions can defend this realm twice per turn. Opponent's dragons cannot attack this realm. Council Aerie can defend itself as a level 9 monster (dragon).

cards.name: Milborne
cards.text: This sleepy village's defenders are immune to offensive spells, and swimming defenders are doubled in base level.

cards.name: The Isle of Beacon Point
cards.text: Champions defending this realm can use any card types (spells, psionic power cards, unarmed combat cards, blood abilities, etc).

cards.name: Lair of the Eye Tyrant
cards.text: This realm is defended by a beholder of monstrous size. The level 15 monster can cast wizard spells and is immune to offensive magical items. No other champion can defend this realm.

cards.name: Dancing Hut of Baba Yaga
cards.text: At the beginning of this player's turn, he can exchange places between this realm and one other realm in his formation. Any holdings remain attached.

cards.name: Anytown, Anywhere
cards.text: All champions attacking this realm are "taxed". The player must take one spell from either his discard pile or his hand and place it in the Abyss. If he can't pay the tax, he cannot attack.

cards.name: Haven of the Undead
cards.text: This player's undead champions and allies are immune to offensive spells and magical items and harmful events.

cards.name: Monastery of Perdien the Damned
cards.text: Clerics refuse to attack this realm. Avatars who attack this realm are halved in base level.

cards.name: Mulmaster
cards.text: Draw a card every time a spell is played.

cards.name: Blackstaff Tower
cards.text: This holding counts as a +3 ally. No offensive wizard spells may be played against champions defending the attached realm. Defending wizards gain 3 levels.

cards.name: Candlekeep
cards.text: Whenever an opponent plays an event, the owner of this holding may immediately examine that player's hand.

cards.name: Mithral Hall
cards.text: Each time the attached realm is successfully defended, search the draw pile for the first artifact or magical item and place it in pool or hand. Reshuffle the draw pile.

cards.name: Moonwell
cards.text: The attached realm can cast cleric spells and is immune to offensive cleric spells and harmful events.

cards.name: Nagawater
cards.text: The waters of this lake contain a vicious naga, which acts as a +4 ally to champions defending the attached realm. The naga instantly destroys all swimming allies.

cards.name: Tilverton
cards.text: If this player has more than his maximum hand size at the end of his turn, he can place magical items underneath the holding instead of discarding them. They are attached to the first defending champion and are discarded if the realm is razed or the holding lost.

cards.name: Lhespenbog
cards.text: This bog surrounds the attached realm, reducing all attacking champions and allies to half their base levels (rounded up).

cards.name: Adderswamp
cards.text: The swamp surrounding the attached realm contains deadly adders, which leech away 2 levels from attacking champions and allies; any reduced to 0 are discarded instantly.

cards.name: Fortification: Rampart
cards.text: This player's allies, whether attacking or defending, cannot be forced to switch sides for any reason.

cards.name: Fortification: Bastion
cards.text: This player's Greyhawk champions are immune to spells cast in phase 3.

cards.name: Fortification: Parapet
cards.text: This player's Greyhawk realms are immune to offensive spells.

cards.name: Fortification: Bailey
cards.text: This holding may be discarded from either hand or formation to cancel a wish or limited wish spell.

cards.name: Fortification: Curtain Wall
cards.text: Only flyers can attack the attached realm.

cards.name: Fortification: Inner Wall
cards.text: Only earthwalkers can attack the attached realm.

cards.name: Fortification: Bulwark
cards.text: Allies defending any Greyhawk realm by this player each gain 3 levels.

cards.name: Fortification: Barricade
cards.text: The base level of all champions and allies attacking the attached realm is halved (rounded down).

cards.name: Fortification: Breastwork
cards.text: Draw a card every time you play an event.

cards.name: The Mud Palace
cards.text: The Mud Palace increases maximum hand size by two cards.

cards.name: South Ledopolus
cards.text: The attached realm can use any ally to defend as a hero champion. The ally is discarded after battle.

cards.name: Ogo
cards.text: All champions and allies who attack the attached realm lose 3 levels - any reduced to 0 are discarded immediately.

cards.name: Arkhold
cards.text: Draw one extra card per turn.

cards.name: Lost Oasis
cards.text: This player can draw one card and play it immediately whenever this realm is attacked.

cards.name: Grak's Pool
cards.text: The pool acts as a +5 ally to any champion defending the attached realm.

cards.name: Silver Spring
cards.text: If the attached realm is razed, one opponent's realm of this player's choice is also razed.

cards.name: Black Waters
cards.text: No werecreature or monster can attack any realm in this player's formation.

cards.name: Dungeon of Gulg
cards.text: All champions (if defeated) and allies who attack this realm are sent to the Abyss at the end of battle.

cards.name: The Celestial Jewel of Sarimie
cards.text: Draw a card every time a cleric spell is cast. Negates any Mulmaster holding in play.

cards.name: Points East Trading Guild
cards.text: This players draws one extra card per turn. Negates any Arkhold holding in play.

cards.name: The Thorn Throne
cards.text: Elf champions defending the attached realm may cast wizard spells and use blood abilities.

cards.name: Peaceful Seas of Nesirie
cards.text: Swimming champions in this player's pool are protected from all harmful events.

cards.name: Sarimie's Temple of Fortune
cards.text: If one of this player's champions or realms is the target of a phase 3 spell, all players draw a card, noting its last digit. The player with the lowest number becomes the recipient instead, and the caster selects a new target if necessary. (If a tie, those players redraw until one is the lowest.)

cards.name: Boeruine Trading Guild
cards.text: If the attached realm is attacked, this player may ask help from a player outside the combat. If that player accepts, he must play one or more allies or magical items on this player's side of the battle. He is then entitled to a free draw from his card pile. Win or lose, the card(s) played is discarded.

cards.name: Taeghan Outfitters
cards.text: During phase 3, this player may rearrange magical items and artifacts between champions in his pool.

cards.name: Straits of Aerele Shipping
cards.text: During a battle he is not involved in, this player can make an attacking player's champions and allies swimmers. In return, this player gets to draw a card from his draw pile if the attack results in a razed or discarded realm. The attacker receives no spoils.

cards.name: Grovnekevic Forest
cards.text: Any elf defending the attached realm gains 3 levels. Heroes, wizards, and clerics who are not elves cannot attack the attached realm.

cards.name: Madding Springs
cards.text: Healing waters contained in the springs aid champions defending the attached realm. Once each battle, the player can retrieve one ally from his discard pile to play immediately.

cards.name: Shark Reef
cards.text: The attached realm must show water or coastline. Hungry sharks guard the waters; at this player's option, they can devour (discard) swimming allies played in any battle.

cards.name: Barter
cards.text: If the attached realm is attacked, this player can barter with a player outside the combat. Players swap hands for the battle, and both draw spoils if victorious in the realm's defense.

cards.name: Dance of the Red Death
