cards.text: This player is immune to all cards that force cards to be discarded from his hand and to all cards that examine his draw pile and discard or rearrange cards found there.

cards.name: Backstab
cards.text: Doubles the attached thief's base level for one round. (Def/4)

cards.name: Pick Pockets
cards.text: Use another player's magical item for this round of combat. At the end of combat, the item's owner draws and discards a card, noting its last digit. If it is higher than the thief's base level, the item is returned; if not, it is discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Move Silently
cards.text: Attached champion ignores realm champions, instantly defeating them. This skill lasts until this champion is discarded. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Set Traps
cards.text: Draw a card and place it face down under the lead realm. When that realm is attacked, discard the card, noting its last digit. Attackers with a base level equal or less than this number are discarded immediately. (Def/3)

cards.name: Hide in Shadows
cards.text: This champion can retreat from a battle back to his pool. He is defeated but not discarded. (Def/4)

cards.name: Climb Walls
cards.text: Until the end of this player's next turn, this champion ignores all walls and can attack realms normally attacked only by flyers or swimmers. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Detect Noise
cards.text: This skill may be played any time and lasts until the beginning of this player's next turn. This champion can use his special power first when defending. (Def)

cards.name: Read Languages
cards.text: This champion can cast wizard spells. This skill may be played any time and lasts until the champion is discarded. (Def)

cards.name: Use Poison
cards.text: The opposing champion must draw and discard a card, noting its last digit. If that digit is 3 or less, that champion is defeated. Lasts until a champion has been defeated by the poison. (Off/4)

cards.name: Concealed Weapon
cards.text: Negates all unarmed combat cards played during this round of combat. No further unarmed combat cards can be played. (Off/4)

cards.name: Werebear
cards.text: Werebeast. The Werebear is immune to the special powers of champions base level 6 or less and their attached cards.

cards.name: Crawling Claws
cards.text: Undead. Immune to offensive spells and psionic power cards. Crawling Claws gain 1 base level for every champion in this player's pool.

cards.name: Nemon Hotep
cards.text: Undead. Immune to offensive spells except those with the word "flame" or "fire" in the title. Opposing champions base level 5 or less are discarded after combat, win or lose.

cards.name: Shera the Wise
cards.text: Werebeast; flyer. Shera is such a masterful flyer that she is immune to harmful events and allies that affect flyers.

cards.name: Winslow the Lich
cards.text: Undead. All cards with icon bonuses played against Winslow lose 2 levels because of his freezing cold touch.

cards.name: Caller in Darkness
cards.text: Undead. Immune to offensive psionic power cards and offensive spells. Psionicists defeated by the Caller are sent to the Abyss.

cards.name: The Vampire
cards.text: Awnshegh; undead; earthwalker. Can use blood abilities and thief skills. All allies played with this champion are considered undead.

cards.name: Wereshark
cards.text: Werebeast; swimmer. The Wereshark is immune to swimming allies and discards any played against him.

cards.name: Negative Planar Energy
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Undead champions subtract their base levels from the base levels of opposing champions. If the opposing champion is reduced to 0 or less, it is immediately discarded. Clerics and avatars are immune to this rule.

cards.name: A Sure Thing
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Instructions to draw and discard a card, noting its last digit, are ignored. All opponents receive the worst possible outcome (0 if high is good, 9 if low is best). This player receives the opposite.

cards.name: Kaisharga
cards.text: Undead. Immune to offensive magical items. Attached champion may cast wizard spells.

cards.name: Guild Master
cards.text: Halfling. The attached champion may use thief skills. He may also use one magical item from any pool for this round of combat.

cards.name: Raaig
cards.text: Undead. Immune to harmful events and offensive magical items. The attached champion may use cleric spells.

cards.name: Cat Burglar
cards.text: Elf. When played in combat, discard a card at random from all other players' hands.

cards.name: Zombie Horde
cards.text: Undead. Gains an additional 2 levels for each ally or spell played against it.

cards.name: Beggar
cards.text: Ask each player not involved in combat for a card playable in the battle. Play any given immediately. If they refuse and you win the round, look at their hand and discard one card of your choice.

cards.name: Ancient Dracolich
cards.text: Undead; flyer; dragon. One opposing ally of this player's choice is instantly discarded.

cards.name: Loric the Fence
cards.text: When this ally is used in battle, you may discard up to 3 magical items or artifacts from your pool or hand and draw two cards for each.

cards.name: Bigby's Dexterous Digits
cards.text: Until dispelled, this champion can use thief skills. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Guardian Mist
cards.text: Prevents either flyers, swimmers, or earthwalkers from attacking this player's formation (caster's choice) until the end of his next turn. (Off/3/4/5)

cards.name: Alarm
cards.text: Cancels a just-played thief skill and prevents the opposing champion from using any more skills for this round of combat. (Off/4)

cards.name: Corruption of the Flesh
cards.text: The affected champion becomes undead; this spell lasts until negated or dispelled. (Def/3/4/5)

cards.name: Power of Faith
cards.text: Negates the effect of all unarmed combat cards playable only by dragons or undead and prevents any more from being played in this round. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Find Traps
cards.text: The affected champion and his allies can attack a realm, regardless of its special powers. The champion also ignores the power of attached holdings, spells, or thief skills. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Blessed Abundance
cards.text: For this round of combat, all cards attached to the affected champion are doubled in level bonus. (Def/3)

cards.name: Monster Mount
cards.text: Any monster in an opposing pool may be used as an ally for this round of battle. Win or lose, that champion returns to his pool at the end of combat. (Off/4)

cards.name: Aging
cards.text: Usable only by any undead. Opponent's base level is halved (rounded down). (Off/4)

cards.name: Cause Despair
cards.text: Usable only by any undead. Opposing allies of +3 or less are immediately removed from combat. (Off/4)

cards.name: Cause Fear
cards.text: Usable only by any undead. All opposing allies are discarded. No more may be played this round. (Off/4)

cards.name: Cause Paralysis
cards.text: Usable only by any undead. An opposing champion of base level 5 or less immediately returns to his pool, defeated. (Off/4)

cards.name: Constitution Drain
cards.text: Usable only by any undead. An opposing champion is discarded at the end of this round of combat, win or lose. (Off/4)

cards.name: Strength Drain
cards.text: Usable only by any undead. Discard a card from your draw pile, noting its last digit. Subtract this number from the opposing champion's level. If reduced to 0 or less, that champion is discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Level Drain
cards.text: Usable only by any undead. Subtract the base level of the attached champion from the base level of the opposing champion. If reduced to 0 or less, that champion is discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Magic Resistance
cards.text: Usable only by any undead. Attached champion is immune to offensive spells, magical items, artifacts, and blood abilities until the end of this player's next turn. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Rapid Regeneration
cards.text: Usable only by any undead. Attached champion gains 2 levels for every card attached to an opposing champion for this round of combat. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Cause Disease
cards.text: Usable only by any undead. If this champion is defeated in combat, attach this card to the opposing champion. His base level is reduced to 1 until negated. (Off/4)

cards.name: Good Triumphs in the End
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Players without undead or werebeast champions in play gain 2 to the base levels of their champions and are immune to harmful events played by players who have undead champions in their pools.

cards.name: Crime Does Not Pay
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Players who have thieves in play must discard a card at the beginning of their turn in order to use thief skills or thief champions' special powers that turn.

cards.name: Busted!
cards.text: Play any time to prevent a thief skill from taking effect. The champion using the skill is immediately discarded. (Harmful)

cards.name: Confused Hunchback
cards.text: Play on any monster to force it to attack another champion, player's choice, in its own pool. The opposing player lays down his hand face up and you both play cards from it until one side wins and draws a card, it may be played immediately. (Harmful)

cards.name: Dark Prophesy
cards.text: Play before any combat you're not involved in, just after a defender comes forward. Write down who you think will win. If you're correct or the battle ends with no winner, draw three cards or discard the top three cards from any draw pile. If you're wrong, raze or discard a realm in your formation. (Helpful)

cards.name: Dark Dreams
cards.text: Play at the end of a round of combat you've lost. Replay the round of combat with the same champions, except that the winner's attachments are discarded; you get to keep yours. The previous round of battle never happened and this one is decisive. (Harmful)

cards.name: Celestial Lights
cards.text: Destroys all undead champions in one player's pool and prevents any undead champions from being involved in combat until the end of this player's next turn. (Harmful)

cards.name: Mirror of Corruption
cards.text: Offensive spells, psionic power cards, blood abilities and harmful events are reflected away from the attached champion and affect the champion of this player's choice, regardless of immunities.

cards.name: Amulet of Undead Aura
cards.text: Subtract the base level of the attached champion from the adjusted level of the opposing champion.

cards.name: Arcane Formula for a Lich
cards.text: Can only be attached to a wizard. The attached champion becomes undead and gains 5 levels to his base level. This item remains attached to him until he's discarded; it cannot be discarded in any other way. (Def)

cards.name: Bag of Beans
cards.text: During phase 3 you may cut your draw pile and take the card you cut to. If it is a realm, discard it immediately. Any other type of card may be held, put in the pool, or played as desired. (Def)

cards.name: Shadowcloak
cards.text: Attached champion can use thief skills. If attached to a thief the shadowcloak becomes +8 and allows the thief to bypass a defending cleric or wizard and automatically raze a realm. The defending champion returns to his pool. (Def)

cards.name: Pavlov's Bell
cards.text: Each turn, select any realm in any formation. If players attack that realm on their turn, every one of their champions and allies receives a +1 bonus. If not, each champion and ally is at -1. This player is not affected. (Off)

cards.name: Ring of Lycanthropy
cards.text: The attached champion becomes a werebeast and is immune to offensive magical items of +4 or less enchantment. (Def)

cards.name: Zombie
cards.text: Undead. The Zombie is immune to offensive psionic powers and the special powers of psionicists. It negates the level bonus of magical items and spells used by opposing champions.

cards.name: Varney the Vampire
cards.text: Undead; flyer. Can use his charm gaze to force one ally to his side during combat. If defeated in battle, he can change to mist and escape to Limbo, returning at the end of his player's next turn.

cards.name: Moonbeast
cards.text: Werebeast. All allies played with this champion become werebeasts and are immune to offensive magical items.

cards.name: Gib Lhadsemlo
cards.text: This fearsome flesh golem is immune to offensive spells (including Wish), magical items, psionic powers, blood abilities, unarmed combat cards, thief skills, and harmful events.

cards.name: Gib Hcivonad
cards.text: While this champion is in a players pool, any ally can be played into his pool as an undead monster champion (base level equal to its level bonus). It retains any special powers. If Gib Hcivonad is discarded, no more ally champions can be played, but those in a pool remain.

cards.name: Gib Reltub
cards.text: Elf; earthwalker. Can cast wizard spells. Gib Reltub is immune to the effects of all events and may choose to ignore rule cards. Any Wish spells cast by him cannot be spell turned.

cards.name: Gib Irod
cards.text: Undead. Can cast cleric spells. This reanimated horror is immune to harmful events, the Wish spell, and the special powers of allies. In combat, her player may discard up to 3 cards from his hand and draw replacements.

cards.name: Gib Drawsemaj
cards.text: Avatar. Can be brought into play just after this player causes an opponent's realm to be discarded. When he appears, his player chooses the special powers of any two non-avatar champions to be his for that game. Limit one avatar per pool.

cards.name: Gib Aklem
cards.text: Elf. This powerful mentalist can invoke his Telekinesis power during combat, causing any champion to become his ally during that round. If he loses the round, the ally is discarded instead of him. (Off/4)

cards.name: Den of Thieves
cards.text: When attacking any realm in this player's formation, the attacking player must discard a card from his hand or pool for each champion and ally sent forward.

cards.name: Mad Scientist's Laboratory
cards.text: This player can reanimate champions and allies from any discard pile. Each acts as a +1 undead ally. At the end of the battle, all cards used in this manner are placed in the Abyss.

cards.name: Adjatha, the Spell Drinker
cards.text: Cannot be attached to a wizard or a cleric. For one round of battle, Adjatha drains all magical items of the opposing champion, rendering the useless. Add +2 to Adjatha for each item drained. (Off)

cards.name: Abhorrence of Shapechangers
cards.text: Cannot be used by monsters. Against all shapechangers (werebeasts, Strahd von Zarovich, and the Kargat Vampire) Abhorrence becomes a +7 weapon. (Def)

cards.name: Sword of the Avoreen
cards.text: Cannot be used by monsters. This sword automatically defeats giant champions, and it reduces opposing undead and werebeasts to level 0. (Off)

cards.name: Sword of Blackflame
cards.text: During battle, the Sword of Blackflame reflects all spells back at the caster. Can be played in combat to reflect a spell just cast. (Def)

cards.name: Sword of the High King
cards.text: Cannot be used by monsters. In battle, this mighty weapon causes fear. The opposing champion becomes level 1, and his allies are each reduced to a +1 bonus. (Off)

cards.name: Dragonsbane
cards.text: During battle, Dragonsbane destroys all dragons. (Off)

cards.name: Post-Hypnotic Suggestion
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. If the psionic champion with this power is defeated, the opposing champion may not attack this player's realms for the rest of the game.

cards.name: Sword of the Black Rose
cards.text: Only usable by monster champions. This sword becomes a +7 weapon when used by an undead champion or werebeast. (Off)

cards.name: Davron Parscall
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. Davron's psionic Death Field can destroy the opposing champion automatically. Davron is sent to the Abyss (taken out of play) if the power is used.

cards.name: Yorgia Sandow
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. Discard one magical item from your pool to activate Yorgia's Metamorphosis, allowing her to imitate the power of any monster in play and add its level to her own.

cards.name: Roghal Baen
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. When used in defense, Roghal can employ his Precognition, forcing the attacker to lay face up all cards he intends to use in this battle. The attacker can use only those cards.

cards.name: Kelsur Brighteye
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. Kelsur can employ his Telekinesis to steal a single magical item or artifact from the opposing champion for the duration of the battle. The item can be of any world.

cards.name: Rand the Bowyer
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. Rand can employ his Levitation, preventing all but flyers from battling him.

cards.name: Seveia Shadowmaster
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. If defeated when attacking, Seveia can employ her Shadow-form to return, invisibly, to her owner's pool. The defender still gets the spoils of victory.

cards.name: Rafe Racker
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. Rafe can psionically Cause Decay, instantly destroying all of the opposing champion's magical items or an artifact of +4 or less.

cards.name: Jacenelle Traen
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. While in the pool, Jacenelle can psionically double another psionicist champion's level during battle.

cards.name: Bilago Lumen
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. At the start of a battle, Bilago can employ his Mindwipe to subtract his adjusted level from the opposing champion's adjusted level. A champion reduced to level 0 is discarded.

cards.name: Dawn d'Ereath
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. Through psionic Ejection, Dawn is automatically immune to all psionic powers.

cards.name: Phridge
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. Can also cast wizard and cleric spells.

cards.name: Seluna Darkenstar
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. Seluna can employ her Appraise power, allowing her owner to look at the opponent's hand. She can then withdraw from combat (treat as a defeat), returning to the pool.

cards.name: Kerm of Tyr
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. Kerm can employ his Ultrablast to halve the opposing champion's level (round up) and discard all allies in play. If victorious, he returns to his pool at the end of his player's next turn.

cards.name: Havrum Riddle
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. When in a battle, Havrum may employ his Stasis Field power to end the battle with no victory or spoils for either side. The opposing champion returns to his pool, and Havrum is discarded.

cards.name: Lyr of the Mists
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. When in battle, Lyr may employ her Banishment power to discard one champion in any pool.

cards.name: Colum Calder
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. Colum may employ All-Round Vision, allowing his owner to examine the hands of all other players before deciding which realm to attack.

cards.name: Kelasar Redbelt
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. When defeated in battle, Kelasar may psionically Detonate an opponent's hand. The opponent must discard the cards and draw a new hand of five.

cards.name: Breshkll Logon
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. In battle, Breshkll may be used as a champion or an ally. He may psionically Cannibalize, adding his opponent's level to his own, but then must be discarded after battle.

cards.name: Masara d'Will
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. Masara can be used as an ally or a champion. She psionically projects Invisible Foes, adding +4 levels to each of her allies.

cards.name: Raydan Valers
cards.text: Psionicist Champion; can use psionic power cards. When involved in battle, Raydan can use Mindlink to use the level and power of a psionicist in another player's pool.

cards.name: Psychic Storm
cards.text: No psionic powers may be used and all psionicists are reduced in level by half (round up). The effects of this card last until another event card is played.

cards.name: Sandstorm
cards.text: All flyers are grounded and cannot attack or defend. All earth-walkers battle at half their normal levels (round up). These effects last until the end of this player's next turn.

cards.name: Necromantic Wave
cards.text: Offensive spells, magical items, and artifacts have no effect on undead champions and allies until the end of this player's next turn.

cards.name: Night of the Blue Moon
cards.text: All werebeasts triple their levels and are immune to offensive spells, magic items, and artifacts until the end of this player's next turn.

cards.name: Zephyrwind
cards.text: Play during step 2 of an opponent's turn. The Zephyrwind carries its victim forward in time, forcing the opponent to skip steps 3 and 4 of his current turn.

cards.name: Avangion's Protection
cards.text: Grants this player's champions immunity to psionic power cards and psionicist champion powers until the start of this players next turn. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Nullification
cards.text: All spells in play must be discarded. No more can be cast until this player's next turn, including Limited Wish.

cards.name: Tuigan Invasion
cards.text: All holdings in play are destroyed (discarded).

cards.name: Dark Negation
cards.text: Negates the special power of one champion or one realm (this player's choice) until the end of this player's next turn.

cards.name: Caravan Raiders
cards.text: Play to cancel the Caravan event card just after it is played. This player may also randomly draw and discard one card from each opponent's hand.

cards.name: Icedawn, Avatar of Auril
cards.text: Avatar. A cleric must be discarded to bring Icedawn into play. Icedawn is immune to events, walls, and offensive cleric spells. Limit one avatar per pool.

cards.name: Nightsinger, Avatar of Shar
cards.text: Avatar. A cleric must be discarded to bring Nightsinger into play. Nightsinger can create darkness, halving the levels of the opposing champion and his allies (round down). Limit one avatar per pool.

cards.name: Bonemaster, Avatar of Nerull
cards.text: Avatar. A cleric must be discarded to bring Bonemaster into play. Bonemaster makes this player's undead immune to offensive spells, magical items, artifacts, and events. Limit one avatar per pool.

cards.name: Lady of Fate, Avatar of Istus
cards.text: Avatar. A cleric must be discarded to bring Lady Fate into play. Before combat, her owner can examine an opponent's hand and discard any two cards. Limit one avatar per pool.

cards.name: Misfortune, Avatar of Ralishaz
cards.text: Avatar. A cleric must be discarded to bring Misfortune into play. Misfortune can replace this player's champion in combat at any time. But after that combat, the avatar must be discarded. Limit one avatar per pool.

cards.name: Tempest, Avatar of Zeboim
cards.text: Avatar. A cleric must be discarded to bring Tempest into play. Tempest makes this player's swimmers immune to offensive spells, magical items, and artifacts. If the Sea Queen is in play, Tempest cannot be. Limit one avatar per pool.

cards.name: Sirrion, Avatar
cards.text: Avatar. A cleric must be discarded to bring Sirrion into play. Immune to offensive spells. In battle, Sirrion forces the opposing champion's magic items and artifacts to be discarded. Limit one avatar per pool.

cards.name: Mirror, Mirror
cards.text: This spell remains in effect until the end of this player's next turn. Mirror, mirror turns all spells against their casters. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Rope Trick
cards.text: Enables this player to end his attack at any time, counting it as a loss, but returning his champion and allies to his hand. (Def/4)

cards.name: Stasis
cards.text: Play immediately after both champions have been chosen. No more cards can be played in this round of battle. (Off/4)

cards.name: Giant Space Hamster
cards.text: Every friendly ally played after this one gains 3 levels.

cards.name: Polymorph Other
cards.text: Replace an opposing champion's power with the power of any other champion in play. Lasts until dispelled. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Phase Out
cards.text: This player may not be attacked again until after his next turn. (Def/5)

cards.name: Gith
cards.text: Earth-walker. Psionicist; may use psionic power cards.

cards.name: Crabman
cards.text: Swimmer. In battle, the crabman can force one other player to contribute an ally to his side. If he has none, the power is wasted. After combat, the ally is discarded.

cards.name: Aquatic Elf
cards.text: Swimmer. No elf champion or ally can oppose him in battle. Becomes level 8 if attacking a coastal realm.

cards.name: Ixitxachitl
cards.text: Swimmer. Gains 4 levels when opposing another swimmer in battle. Can cast clerical spells. When attacking or defending a coastal realm, can cast wizard spells.

cards.name: Kirre
cards.text: Psionicist; may use psionic power cards. If Kirre is defeated, his owner may draw one card and add it to his hand.

cards.name: Locathah Champion
cards.text: Swimmer. All opposing allies lose their special powers.

cards.name: Living Wall
cards.text: This monster absorbs (discards) all champions and allies of level 6 and higher. It is immune to artifacts and offensive spells and magical items. Champions, offensive psionic powers, and allies must be level 5 or less to attack it.

cards.name: Tako
cards.text: Swimmer. In combat, the Tako multiplies its level times the level of its lowest ally.

cards.name: Earth Elemental
cards.text: Earth-walker. In battle, the earth elemental automatically defeats any champion whose card number has a last digit of 3 or less.

cards.name: Skriaxit, Composite Elemental
cards.text: Earth-walker. In battle, Skriaxit forces the opposing champion and all his allies to fight at half their normal levels (round down).

cards.name: Mountain Giant
cards.text: Earth-walker. Reflects all psionic powers back to the projector.

cards.name: Grippli
cards.text: Swimmer. The Grippli can use any magical item, with its highest level bonus.

cards.name: Chameleon Power
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. A psionicist with this power can be used as an ally. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Brandobaris's Inversion
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. All champions of base level 6 and above are reduced to level 2. The levels of all others are doubled.

cards.name: Energy Containment
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. Until the end of the turn, the psionicist with this power is immune to all cards calling for a reduction of level(s). (Def/4)

cards.name: Complete Healing
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. The psionicist champion using this power may retrieve three allies from his discard pile and return them to his hand. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Wheel of Fate
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. At the start of this player's turns, all players draw a card and discard it, except for the card with the lowest first digit. Upon drawing his last card, each player shuffles his discards to form a new draw pile.

cards.name: Teleport Trigger
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. Place this card under one of your realms; it acts as a holding. When this realm is attacked, you may switch it with any other in your formation. Switched realms remain in their new places afterward. (Def/3)

cards.name: Molecular Rearrangement
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. Discard all magical items and artifacts in play. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Telekinesis
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. The wielder may steal the use of one magical item or one artifact in play anywhere. The card returns to its owner's hand afterward. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Mind Shield
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. When cast, it makes its player immune until the end of his next turn to all cards that look at his draw pile or hand. (Def/3/4/5)

cards.name: Molecular Agitation
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. All magical items and artifacts of the opposing champion are discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Control Wind
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. Negates for this player the effect of all spells, events, champion powers, and rule cards until the end of his next turn. (Def/3/4/5)

cards.name: Cause Decay
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. For this round of battle, change all of an opponent's magical item and artifact levels to +1 and negate all of their special powers. (Off/4)

cards.name: Repugnance
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. Used in battle, this power forces all allies of the opposing champion to join the user's side. (Off/4)

cards.name: Mind Thrust
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions.

cards.name: The Sea Queen, Avatar of Zeboim
cards.text: Avatar. Discard a cleric to bring the Sea Queen into play. She makes swimmers of all this player's champions and allies and may reclaim one magical item each turn as it is discarded. If Tempest is in play, the Sea Queen cannot be. Limit one avatar per pool.

cards.name: Kiri, Avatar of Kiri-Jolith
cards.text: Avatar. A cleric must be discarded to bring Kiri into play. In combat, Kiri negates all special powers of all champions in play. Limit one avatar per pool.

cards.name: Shadair Mesker
cards.text: Shadair can use wizard spells and psionic power cards.

cards.name: Mental Barrier
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. For the remainder of this battle, all offensive psionic powers used against this champion become +2 and have no extra abilities. (Def/4)

cards.name: Tower of Iron Will
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. User becomes immune to offensive psionic powers until the beginning of his next turn. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Intellect Fortress
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. Until the end of his next turn, the user of this power is immune to all offensive spells, magical items, and psionic powers except those of avatars. (Def/3)

cards.name: Control Flames
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. This champion may force the discard of one non-champion card with the word flame or fire in its title. (Def/4)

cards.name: Psychic Storm
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. No psionic power cards or artifacts may be played.

cards.name: Nullify Magic
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. No wizard or clerical spells may be played.

cards.name: Mind of the Avatar
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. All avatars can use psionic power cards.

cards.name: Gift of the Avatar
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Only clerics may use psionic power cards.

cards.name: Intensify
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. Doubles the levels of all allies played on this champion. (Def/4)

cards.name: Summon Planar Creature
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. The user may search his draw deck for one champion of level 6 or less to aid him in this battle. Reshuffle the draw deck afterward. (Def/4)

cards.name: Graft Weapon
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. In combat, the user of this power can use the level and effects of one magical item or artifact in another player's pool. (Def/4)

cards.name: Melt Stone
cards.text: The opposing champion is reduced in level to +3, and his allies to +1, for the duration of this combat. (Off/4)

cards.name: Psionic Blast
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions.

cards.name: Magnify
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. A champion using this power doubles his level for the duration of this battle. (Def/4)

cards.name: Probability Travel
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. This power allows its user and his allies to attack any realm, regardless of its position. (Def/3)

cards.name: Banishment
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. No allies can be played against a psionicist champion using this power. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Create Object
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. The user can look through his draw pile and select any single magical item or artifact to play immediately. Reshuffle the draw pile afterward. (Def/3/4)

cards.name: Psychic Lock
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. Ends combat. Both champions return to their pools; all other cards are discarded. The battle is a draw; there are no spoils. (Off/4)

cards.name: Life Draining
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. Automatically defeats undead champions and allies. (Off/4)

cards.name: Dimensional Door
cards.text: Psionic power. Usable by psionicist champions. Forces the attacker to redirect his attack to any other realm in play, ignoring its placement and special powers during the battle. (Off/4)

cards.name: Crystal Sphere
cards.text: Any psionicist champion defending the Crystal Sphere doubles his level.

cards.name: Rock of Bral
cards.text: Can be attached to any realm. Any defender is considered a psionicist champion. If attached to the Crystal Sphere, it adds +6 to the defender's level.

cards.name: Unipsi
cards.text: Usable by any avatar. An avatar with this artifact attached can use any number of artifacts from any worlds.

cards.name: The Inverter
cards.text: Usable by any wizard. This artifact enables wizards to use psionic power cards.

cards.name: Royal Conscription and Tax Levy
cards.text: All opponents of this player must skip step 3 of their turns until the beginning of this player's next turn.

cards.name: Fate's Promise
cards.text: This sword negates all spells cast by the opposing champion. (Def)

cards.name: Bando's Whitestone
cards.text: Usable by any psionicist champion. This artifact enables psionicists to cast wizard spells.

cards.name: Quill Pen of the Planes
cards.text: The attached champion may duplicate the effect of any one spell, psionic power card, or psionicist champion power in play.

cards.name: The Tantelear
cards.text: Usable by any champion. This artifact generates a wild talent. It allows the attached champion to duplicate the power of any one psionicist champion currently in play.

cards.name: Boragh's Ring
cards.text: Allows monsters to use psionic power cards, but the psionic card's level are all reduced to +2. (Def)

cards.name: Shawl of Mordenheim
cards.text: Any monster with this shawl is immune to all offensive spells, offensive magical items, and artifacts specifically directed at monsters. (Def)

cards.name: Sirrion's Brooch
cards.text: Usable only by clerics. Grants immunity from all offensive spells, offensive magical items, and artifacts. (Def)

cards.name: Psionicist Bracelet
cards.text: Usable only by a psionicist champion. No wizard spells may be cast during any battle with this champion. (Off)

cards.name: Psionicist Anklet
cards.text: Usable only by a psionicist champion. No cleric spells may be cast during any battle with this champion. (Off)

cards.name: Psionatrix
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. The Psionatrix reduces all psionicists to half their normal levels (round down) and prevents the use of their powers and psionic power cards.

cards.name: Antimagic Cloud
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. While the antimagic cloud is in effect, all spells, magical items, artifacts, and champions abilities (except psionicists') are nullified.

cards.name: Poisoned Water
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Discard all swimmers in pools; no new swimmers may be put into play.

cards.name: The Ultimate Rule
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until the end of the game. No new rule card can be played. Limit one per deck.

cards.name: Cosmic Intervention
cards.text: Play at the beginning of your turn to cancel the Ultimate Rule Card. Both cards are sent to the Abyss (taken out of play). Limit one per deck.

cards.name: Avatar's Edict
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Avatars can be played without discarding clerics.

cards.name: The Legendary Artifact
cards.text: This artifact can be attached to any champion, and increases his level to 10. Limit one per deck.

cards.name: Geneva Conclave
cards.text: This holding can be attached to any realm. The realm can cast any spell and is never affected by events. Limit one per deck.

cards.name: The Wardmeister Strategy
cards.text: When played at the start of another player's turn, this event eliminates either phase 3 or phase 4 (chosen by the event player) of the current player's turn. Limit one per deck.

cards.name: Barovia
cards.text: Defending champion can cast wizard spells and can discard one enemy ally each round.

cards.name: Darkon
cards.text: In a victorious defense, a maximum of one ally remains with the realm card and becomes undead.

cards.name: Kartakass
cards.text: Werebeast champions and allies cannot attack this realm.

cards.name: Keening
cards.text: Each round Keening is attacked, one living enemy ally is discarded.

cards.name: Tepest
cards.text: If razed in combat, look at top six cards of opponent's deck. Place one at the bottom of his draw pile.

cards.name: Vebrek
cards.text: Wolves are a +3 ally to defending champions.

cards.name: Invidia
cards.text: If razed in combat, draw two cards at random from attacker's hand and discard them.

cards.name: Dementlieu
cards.text: Defender can change the attacking champion to any other champion in the attacker's pool.

cards.name: Valachan
cards.text: Can defend itself as a level 5 undead champion (vampire).

cards.name: Har' Akir
cards.text: Cleric spells lose 2 levels when attacking Har' Akir.

cards.name: Sri Raji
cards.text: Only champions with an unmodified level of 6 or higher can attack this realm.

cards.name: Castle Ravenloft
cards.text: The attached realm and its defenders are immune to all offensive spells.

cards.name: Azalin's Graveyard
cards.text: Can call upon a +6 zombie horde as an ally to defend the attached realm for one round per battle.

cards.name: Kargat Mausoleum
cards.text: The attached realm can defend itself as a level 4 undead champion (vampire).

cards.name: Paridon
cards.text: If the attached realm is attacked, a doppleganger imitates any one of the attacker's allies each round.

cards.name: Pharaoh's Rest
cards.text: The power of the ancients subtracts 3 levels from champions attacking the attached realm.

cards.name: Mists
cards.text: All players can rearrange their realms and holdings.

cards.name: Dark Powers
cards.text: All players shuffle their discard piles and place on top of their decks.

cards.name: Grand Conjunction
cards.text: All champions can attack any realm, regardless of its position, until the end of this player's next turn.

cards.name: Harvest Moon
cards.text: Double the level of all werebeasts and undead until the end of this player's next turn.

cards.name: All Hollow's Eve
cards.text: All monster champions gain 3 levels until the end of this player's next turn.

cards.name: Quirk of Fate
cards.text: All champions use the first digit of their card number for their level until the end of this player's next turn.

cards.name: Disrupted Magic
cards.text: Champions that can cast wizard spells now can cast only cleric spells and vice versa, until the end of this player's next turn.

cards.name: Power of the Land
cards.text: All champions gain 1 level for each Ravenloft realm and holding in their player's control until the end of this player's next turn.

cards.name: Spell Book of Drawmij
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Victorious Greyhawk champions may keep one spell used that round that they can cast normally when they return to the pool. The spell is automatically cast again the next time that champion fights. Any dispel magic card can be used to remove the spell.

cards.name: City States
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. One Dark Sun holding can be counted as a realm for the purpose of victory conditions.

cards.name: Islands of Terror
cards.text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Play Ravenloft realms face down, but vertically. (Holdings are still face up, as are other realms.) Reveal the realm only when it is attacked. If one of his Ravenloft realms is razed, the player can rearrange all his Ravenloft realms.

cards.name: Eyes of the Undead
cards.text: If an opponent has an undead champion or ally, player can look at the opponent's hand. (Def/4)

cards.name: Living Ward
cards.text: All of the opponent's living allies (not undead) in play are discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Binding Curse
cards.text: If defeated, this champion can curse its opponent to lose 3 levels until a dispel magic removes this card. (Off/4)

cards.name: Conjure Grave Elemental
cards.text: Casting this spell creates a +8 ally for the duration of the round. (Off/4)

cards.name: Animate Rock
cards.text: (Off/4)

cards.name: Word of Recall
cards.text: Pick one opposing ally card and discard it. (Off/4)

cards.name: Glyph of Warding
cards.text: All opposing allies lose 1 level. (Off/4)

cards.name: Call Lightning
cards.text: (Off/4)

cards.name: Prayer
cards.text: This champion's allies all gain 2 levels. (Def/4)

cards.name: Turn Undead
cards.text: All undead enemy allies with levels equal to or less than the champion must be discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Imbue with Spell Ability
cards.text: A cleric in a player's pool can cast this on any champion, allowing him to cast cleric spells for this round. (Def/3)

cards.name: Insect Plague
cards.text: (Off/4)

cards.name: Plane Shift
cards.text: Player can substitute any unrazed realm's power, but not its attached holding, for this round. (Off/4)

cards.name: Heal
cards.text: Player may retrieve any champion or ally from his discard pile and return to his hand. (Def/3)

cards.name: Shadow Magic
cards.text: (Off/4)

cards.name: Shades
cards.text: Casting this spell creates a +4 ally. (Def/4)

cards.name: Vampiric Touch
cards.text: Has no effect on undead champions. (Off/4)

cards.name: Hold Person
cards.text: Reduces opposing champion's level to 0 for this round. (Off/4)

cards.name: Detect Magic
cards.text: Opponent lays all spells and magical items in his hand face up on the table for this round. (Off/4)

cards.name: Augment Undead
cards.text: Undead champions and allies gain 2 levels for this round. (Def/4)

cards.name: Strahd's Malefic Meld
cards.text: Multiply the levels of the two weakest allies and add to the total. If only one ally is present, it is now a 0. (Def/4)

cards.name: Misty Summons
cards.text: From any pool, use a champion (level only) not immune to spells as an ally. Win or lose, champion is returned to its pool. (Def/4)

cards.name: Neverending Nightmare
cards.text: Player adds 1 level to this champion for each realm and holding he has in play. (Def/4)

cards.name: Chill Touch
cards.text: Does not affect undead monsters. (Off/4)

cards.name: Tarokka Deck
cards.text: When used in battle, the player may look at the top six cards of his opponent's deck and discard one. (Def)

cards.name: Timepiece of Klorr
cards.text: If victorious, this champion may make one extra attack on the same realm before being put in his pool. (Def)

cards.name: Ring of Regeneration
cards.text: If this champion is defeated, he is returned to his pool at the end of the player's next turn. (Def)

cards.name: Sun Sword
cards.text: The sword becomes +5 if the opposing champion is undead. (Off)

cards.name: Blood Coin
cards.text: If defeated, put card on opponent's champion. Opponent's hand size is reduced by one until dispel magic is cast or the new owner is defeated. (Off)

cards.name: Staff of Mimicry
cards.text: Imitates one magical item attached to any other champion in this player's pool. (Def)

cards.name: Soul Searcher Medallion
cards.text: Before combat, the player can look at one other player's hand. If used, the attached champion cannot attack this turn. (Def)

cards.name: Ring of Reversion
cards.text: The opposing champion cannot use his power or cast spells. (Off)

cards.name: Amulet of the Beast
cards.text: Used in combat, one enemy ally (except undead) is turned into a werebeast, causing him to switch sides. (Off)

cards.name: Cat of Felkovic
cards.text: If victorious, champion keeps up to six ally cards face down with it. These are dead allies; however, champion gains 1 level for each card. (Off)

cards.name: Apparatus
cards.text: Player borrows any champion (level only) from any pool as an ally. Win or lose, champion is returned to its pool.

cards.name: Crown of Souls
cards.text: When used to attack, defender's realm power (but not attached holding) is ignored.

cards.name: Holy Symbol of Ravenkind
cards.text: Opponent cannot use undead champions or allies. OR card can be discarded to force Strahd to be discarded permanently.

cards.name: Tapestry of Dark Souls
cards.text: When used in combat, opponent can have only one ally. Any extras are discarded.

cards.name: Fang of the Nosferatu
cards.text: Attached champion can substitute the powers of any champion from any pool other than its own.

cards.name: Kargat Vampire
cards.text: Flyer. Undead. Becomes +7 if defending a realm with a mausoleum or graveyard holding.

cards.name: Flesh Golem
cards.text: Rips magical items from its opponent, who must discard all attached magical items.

cards.name: Ghost Ship
cards.text: Champion and allies become flyers. When attacking, can switch attack to a different realm.

cards.name: Strahd Zombies
cards.text: Undead.

cards.name: Fiend
cards.text: Flyer. Opposing clerics lose 3 levels against this ally.

cards.name: Spectre
cards.text: Flyer. Undead. All enemy champions and allies (except undead) lose 1 level when opposing this ally.

cards.name: Vistani
cards.text: If opposing champion is victorious, he loses his power until dispel magic is cast on him. Keep this card with the champion.

cards.name: Loup-Garou
cards.text: Werebeast. Opposing champion is automatically defeated unless he has or can play a magical item.

cards.name: Werebat
cards.text: Flyer. Werebeast.

cards.name: Mysterious Stranger
cards.text: One card from this player's hand is kept hidden under this one. Use it in his next battle, then hide a new card.

cards.name: Azalin
cards.text: Undead. Casts wizard spells. If victorious in battle, takes one ally with him into the pool.

cards.name: Adam
cards.text: Immune to all offensive spells and magical items.

cards.name: Ankhtepot
cards.text: Undead. Casts cleric spells. Ignores the effects of opposing holdings.

cards.name: Ireena Kolyana
cards.text: Level 5 vs. undead. If facing Strahd, he returns to his pool; that player must select another champion or lose the battle.

cards.name: Dr. Rudolph Van Richten
cards.text: Opponent must lay his hand face up for this round. Level 6 vs. any Ravenloft champion.

cards.name: Harkon Lukas
cards.text: Werebeast. When in combat, he picks one magical item, artifact, spell, or ally of the opponent to be discarded.

cards.name: Headless Horseman
cards.text: Flyer. If attacking, it can choose to automatically win the round, but card must then be discarded.

cards.name: Arijani
cards.text: When attacking, picks which champion from his opponent's pool will face him.

cards.name: Wilfred Godefroy
cards.text: Undead. Flyer. Any undead allies gain 2 levels.

cards.name: Tiyet
cards.text: Undead. Casts cleric spells.

cards.name: Sir Hiregaard
cards.text: When defending, he turns into a level 6 monster.

cards.name: Gabrielle Aderre
cards.text: If defeated, looks at opponent's hand and places one card on the bottom of that player's draw pile.

cards.name: Hags of Tepest
cards.text: Cast wizard spells. When in combat, player can take one wizard spell from his deck and play it. Reshuffle the deck.

cards.name: Sir Edmund Bloodsworth
cards.text: Doppleganger. Imitates the level or power of his opponent, but not both. Uses power second (after opponent).

cards.name: High Master Illithid
cards.text: Can look at opponent's hand after declaring which realm he is attacking.

cards.name: Dr. Mordenheim
cards.text: Can use one ally card from his discard deck.

cards.name: Sergei Von Zarovich
cards.text: Undead. Sergei is immune to all event cards, even beneficial ones.

cards.name: Lord Soth
cards.text: Immune to offensive wizard spells. Opposing Dragonlance champions cannot use their powers.

cards.name: Strahd Von Zarovich
cards.text: Flyer. Undead. Casts wizard spells. If defeated in combat and no other Strahd is in play, he returns to his pool at the end of player's next turn.

cards.name: Isle of the Ape
cards.text: Can defend itself as a level 9 monster. Cannot be attacked by heroes or clerics. Defenders are immune to offensive spells and offensive psionic power cards.

cards.name: The Forbidden City
cards.text: Cannot be attacked by earthwalkers. Allies defending this realm are doubled in base level.

cards.name: The Lost Caverns of Tsojcanth
cards.text: Cannot be attacked by flyers or swimmers. Defenders of this realm are immune to offensive spells.

cards.name: White Plume Mountain
cards.text: Players attacking this realm must discard a card from their hand during each round of battle.

cards.name: Doc's Island
cards.text: Can only be attacked by swimmers or flyers. Magical items and artifacts of attackers lose their bonuses but not their powers.

cards.name: The City of Phlan
cards.text: Cannot be attacked by monsters unless Zhentil Keep is somewhere in play. Immune to offensive cleric spells.

cards.name: The Barrier Peaks
cards.text: Can only be attacked by flyers or earthwalkers. Defending dwarves double their base levels and are immune to offensive psionics.

cards.name: Tomb of Horrors
cards.text: Cannot be attacked by flyers. Defending monsters are immune to offensive spells and the special powers of avatars.

cards.name: Demonweb Pits
cards.text: Any elf (drow) defending this realm is doubled in base level and is immune to offensive spells. Spells cast by defending drow during a round of battle cannot be dispelled.

cards.name: The Hidden Shrine of Tamoachan
cards.text: Clerics defending this realm are immune to offensive psionic power cards. Defending avatars are not discarded if defeated, but return to their pool at the end of his player's next turn.

cards.name: The Depths of the Earth
cards.text: Cannot be attacked by flyers or swimmers. Defending swimmers are doubled in base level. If razed, the attacking champion must discard all attached magical items and artifacts.

cards.name: Isle of Dread
cards.text: Can defend itself as a level 7 monster. Can only be attacked by flyers or swimmers.

cards.name: Desert of Desolation
cards.text: Cannot be attacked by swimmers. Defending undead gain 4 levels.

cards.name: The Glacial Rift
cards.text: Cannot be attacked by swimmers. Defending giants gain 2 levels and are immune to offensive spells and offensive magical items.

cards.name: The Lendore Isles
cards.text: Cannot be attacked by monsters or heroes. If this realm is razed, this player may return the bottom card from his discard pile to his hand.

cards.name: The Lost City
cards.text: Cannot be attacked by flyers or swimmers. Only AD&D champions can attack this realm; champions from other worlds cannot attack.

cards.name: Village of Orlane
cards.text: Defending heroes double their base levels. Attacking monsters are at half their base levels (rounded down) and lose their special powers.

cards.name: Sunderhan, Isle of the Slave Lords
cards.text: Can defend itself as a level 7 hero. Champions (and any attached items) and their allies who are defeated while attacking this realm are sent to the Abyss.

cards.name: Keep on the Borderlands
cards.text: When this holding is played, choose one type of champion that cannot attack the attached realm (hero, monster, etc).

cards.name: Palace of the Silver Princess
cards.text: Champions attacking this realm are halved (rounded down) in total levels and cannot use allies.

cards.name: Labyrinth of Madness
cards.text: Champions attacking the attached realm must draw and discard a card, noting the last digit of its number. If the number is higher than the attacker's base level, the champion is sent to Limbo. The attacker may continue.

cards.name: Village of Hommlet
cards.text: The attached realm must be razed twice during one player's turn to earn spoils of victory. The holding is not discarded until the realm is razed twice.

cards.name: Oasis of White Palm
cards.text: Events cannot be played when attacking the attached realm.

cards.name: Ghost Tower of Iverness
cards.text: The attached realm cannot be attacked by a champion of base level 6 or less.

cards.name: Vault of the Drow
cards.text: Defending elf (drow) champions can cast spells and use psionic power cards.

cards.name: Tenser's Castle
cards.text: The attached realm can only be attacked by heroes or wizards, and all attacking allies must be flyers or swimmers.

cards.name: The Temple of Death
cards.text: The attached realm can only be attacked by clerics. Offensive spells cast in defense of the attached realm are doubled in level.

cards.name: Bigby the Great
cards.text: Bigby can cast one spell turning spell during one other player's turn. He is immune to offensive spells and psionic power cards when defending a Greyhawk realm.

cards.name: Tenser the Arch Mage
cards.text: Tenser can elect to be a hero able to cast cleric spells during any one battle, chosen before combat begins. Tenser can cast wizard spells during another player's phase 4 to aid a player in battle.

cards.name: Oonga the Ape
cards.text: Ignores the effects of any holding in play. The attached holding of any realm he attacks is discarded at the beginning of the battle.

cards.name: Falx the Silver Dragon
cards.text: Flyer. Can cast wizard spells. Any magical items attached to Falx cannot be discarded by any means. Gains 1 additional level for each attached magical item.

cards.name: Lord Robilar
cards.text: Robilar's mechanical steed grants him the ability to earthwalk. He is immune to offensive cleric spells and the special powers of avatars.

cards.name: Phoebus the Lizard Man
cards.text: Swimmer. If defeated in battle, Phoebus's allies return to the player's hand. Opposing champions' magical items are discarded at the end of battle, win or lose.

cards.name: Vecna the Arch Lich
cards.text: Avatar. A Greyhawk champion with the Eye and Hand of Vecna must be discarded to bring Vecna into play. Vecna is immune to offensive spells, psionics, and unarmed combat cards. All allies played with the lich are considered undead; they return to the player's hand after a victorious battle.

cards.name: Kas the Terrible
cards.text: Undead. Immune to the effects of harmful events while in combat. If opposing Vecna in battle with the Sword of Kas, Vecna's base level is 0.

cards.name: Grimslade the Gray
cards.text: Can cast wizard spells. Whenever Grimslade attacks, his player draws and discards a card, noting the last digit. If it is 3 or less, the opponent can play no more cards during the battle.

cards.name: Ren o' the Blade
cards.text: Ren can be sent to the Abyss to retrieve a realm from the discard pile, placing it in the player's formation during phase 2 instead of playing a realm from his hand.

cards.name: Acererak the Eternal
cards.text: Undead. Can cast wizard spells and use psionic power cards. Can summon one undead ally from any discard pile to aid him in battle, which returns to its original discard pile afterward.

cards.name: Wulfgar
cards.text: Dwarves and halflings cannot stand against Wulfgar in battle. Because of his hammer, the Aegis-fang, Wulfgar's base level is doubled against giant and dragon champions.

cards.name: Jarl the Frost Giant
cards.text: Earthwalker. Jarl ignores the special powers of all realms. He gains 6 levels when defending the Glacial Rift.

cards.name: King Snurre the Fire Giant
cards.text: Earthwalker. If King Snurre doesn't attack on his turn, at the beginning of another player's turn he can order an opponent's champion not to attack that turn.

cards.name: Queen Frumpy the Fire Giant
cards.text: Can cast cleric spells. Queen Frumpy gains 2 levels when defending a realm. She is so repulsive, allies of +4 or less cannot be played against her.

cards.name: The Keeper
cards.text: Giant. This deformed hill giant is immune to offensive psionics. One artifact of any world can be attached to him; it is never discarded, returning instead to the player's hand.

cards.name: Nosnra the Hill Giant
cards.text: Nosnra can attack any AD&D realm, regardless of position or powers. Nosnra is level 10 if no allies are played with him.

cards.name: Ombi the Renegade Dwarf
cards.text: Ombi gains earthwalking if any player has a giant in play. He can be used as an ally for any giant in battle, returning to his pool afterward unless discarded during battle.

cards.name: Mordenkainen's Disjunction
cards.text: Destroys all magical items and artifacts in one pool unless the affected player can draw a card with a last digit of 2 or less (drawn card is discarded). (Off/3)

cards.name: Slay Living
cards.text: Kills any opposing champion or ally of base level 5 or less. Undead are immune to this spell. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Intercession
cards.text: Can be cast at any time. This spell cancels the effects of any just-played event card. (Off)

cards.name: Conjure Earth Elemental
cards.text: The +6 ally summoned with this spell stays with the casting champion until the beginning of this player's next turn. Opposing earthwalking allies are immediately discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Conjure Fire Elemental
cards.text: The +5 ally summoned with this spell stays with the casting champion until the beginning of this player's next turn. Opposing allies of +2 or less are incinerated (discarded). (Off/4)

cards.name: Conjure Air Elemental
cards.text: The +4 ally summoned with this spell stays with the casting champion until the beginning of this player's next turn. Opposing flying allies are immediately discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Conjure Water Elemental
cards.text: The +3 ally summoned with this spell stays with the casting champion until the beginning of this player's next turn. Opposing swimming allies are immediately discarded. (Off/4)

cards.name: Crystalbrittle
cards.text: Destroys one magical item anywhere in play. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Energy Drain
cards.text: Draw and discard a card when this spell is cast, noting the last digit. Subtract that number from the target champion's level. If the level reaches 0, the champion is discarded. Undead are immune to this spell. (Off/3/4)

cards.name: Tyranthraxus, the Possessing Spirit
cards.text: Play on an opponent's champion, who then becomes a monster able to cast wizard spells. The champion remains under control of the event player until canceled. (Harmful)

cards.name: Coming of the Phoenix
cards.text: Retrieve one champion (excluding avatars) from the discard pile and put it into play. (Helpful)

cards.name: The Forgotten King
cards.text: If their first attack is successful, all heroes can make an additional attack until the end of this player's next turn. All heroes are considered earthwalkers during this event. (Helpful)

cards.name: Elixir of Life
cards.text: Play on a champion who is about to be defeated. He returns to his pool instead of being discarded. If the player was attacking, he can continue with another champion. No spoils of victory are drawn for the champion's defeat. (Helpful)

cards.name: Giant Raid!
cards.text: All giants in play double their total levels when attacking until this player's next turn. (Helpful)

cards.name: The Vampire Attacks!
cards.text: All attacking undead are immune to opposing champions' special powers until this player's next turn. (Helpful)

cards.name: Undead Guardian
cards.text: Creates an undead level 5 monster until the beginning of this player's next turn. It is the first to defend this player's realms during attacks by all other players. Any spoils obtained by it are doubled. (Helpful)

cards.name: Barbarian Charge!
cards.text: Attacking champions who do not use spells or psionic power cards are doubled in base level until the beginning of this player's next turn. (Helpful)

cards.name: Psionic Shield
cards.text: This player's realms, champions, and allies are immune to offensive psionic power cards until the beginning of his next turn. (Helpful)

cards.name: Volcanic Eruption
cards.text: This event razes all realms that can only be attacked by swimmers or earthwalkers. (Harmful)

cards.name: The Midas Orb
cards.text: Champions of base level 3 or less cannot defend against a champion with the Midas Orb. The Orb changes one opposing ally to gold, sending it to the Abyss.

cards.name: Invulnerable Coat of Arnd
cards.text: Can only be attached to heroes of any world. Heroes wearing this artifact ignore the levels and powers of all magical items, and opposing allies' levels are halved (rounded down).

cards.name: Ipsissimo's Black Goose
cards.text: Can only be attached to clerics of any world. When the attached cleric is in this player's pool, it and all other clerics in the pool are immune to harmful events.

cards.name: Tenser's Crystal Ball
cards.text: Can only be attached to wizards of any world. At the beginning of this player's turn, inspect the draw deck of an opposing player. At any time, the player can discard the Crystal Ball to shuffle an opponent's draw pile.

cards.name: Albruin
cards.text: Cannot be attached to clerics or wizards. Any monster opposing the attached champion is at half its base level (rounded down). Opponents cannot use psionic power cards.

cards.name: Blackrazor
cards.text: The attached champion must attack during his turn or discard one champion from his pool. Allies attached to this champion during battle are immune to offensive spells, psionics, and the special powers of champions and allies.

cards.name: Wave
cards.text: Can only be attached to swimming champions of any world. Nonswimming allies played with the attached champion are considered swimmers. Allies who are already swimmers are doubled in level.

cards.name: Whelm
cards.text: Can only be attached to dwarf champions of any world. This weapon automatically defeats giants. Whelm returns to the player's hand if the attached champion is discarded.

cards.name: Girdle of Dwarvenkind
cards.text: The attached champion is considered a dwarf for the purposes of card play, gaining earthwalking ability. (Def)

cards.name: Star Gem of Martek: Opal
cards.text: The attached champion can use psionic power cards. If joined with another Star Gem, the attached champion is immune to offensive psionics. (Def)

cards.name: Star Gem of Martek: Sapphire
cards.text: Allies played with the attached champion cannot be removed by any means. If joined with another Star Gem, the attached champion gains an additional 5 levels. (Def)

cards.name: Star Gem of Martek: Ruby
cards.text: Undead cannot use their special powers when opposing the attached champion. If joined with another Star Gem, the attached champion is immune to harmful events. (Def)

cards.name: Star Gem of Martek: Clear Crystal
cards.text: Spells cast by the attached champion cannot be dispelled. If all five Star Gems are joined, the attached champion can choose to win any battle, automatically razing the realm. If this power is used, the Star Gems are discarded. (Def)

cards.name: Star Gem of Martek: Amethyst
cards.text: If the attached champion is discarded as a result of combat, the opposing champion is sent to the Abyss. If joined with another Star Gem, the attached champion can cast any spell. (Off)

cards.name: Big Giant's Rock
cards.text: Usable only by giants. Opposing champions must discard one ally of level 4 or less if this item is played during a battle. (Off)

cards.name: Huge Giant's Rock
cards.text: Usable only by giants. Opposing champions must discard one ally of level 7 or less if this item is played during battle. Opponents cannot add magical items in battle. (Off)

cards.name: Enormous Giant's Rock
cards.text: Usable only by giants. Destroys one opposing ally and artifact when played in battle, and no further allies can be played by the opponent. (Off)

cards.name: Hypnosnake
cards.text: This ally hypnotizes one opposing ally chosen at any time during the battle, causing that ally to switch sides.

cards.name: The Rahasia
cards.text: If the attached champion is defeated in battle, the opposing player must discard all champions and events in his hand.

cards.name: Remorhaz
cards.text: This ally is +8 if played with a giant. Any additional allies played by this player are immune to offensive psionics for this round of battle.

cards.name: The Incantrix
cards.text: Immune to offensive spells. When this ally is played, all spells in play are dispelled.

cards.name: Winter Wolf Pack
cards.text: Increases to +8 when allied with giants. Doubles the base level of any champion defending the Glacier Rift.

cards.name: Hydra
cards.text: Gains 2 levels for each additional ally played by this player during a round of battle. Immune to the powers of opposing allies.

cards.name: Red Dragon
cards.text: Flyer. This ally's level increases to +7 if played with a dragon champion. All allies played after the red dragon may be considered flyers (player's choice).

cards.name: Rampaging Oni
cards.text: When played, all psionic power cards in play are canceled and no more can be played during this round of battle. Oni becomes +7 if played with a Forgotten Realms Champion.

cards.name: The Live Ones
cards.text: Playing this ally cancels the special powers of any opposing wizard for one round of combat. This ally returns to the player's hand at the conclusion of a victorious battle.

cards.name: Flying Kick
cards.text: Unarmed combat card; usable only by heroes. This maneuver can either count as +5 in any battle or it can destroy (discard) an ally or maigcal item of +5 or less (this player's choice). (Off/4)

cards.name: Haymaker
cards.text: Unarmed combat card; usable only by heroes. Opponent must draw and discard a card, noting the last digit. If the opposing champion's base level is equal to or less than the digit, the opponent is defeated. Undead are immune to this maneuver. (Off/4)

cards.name: Uppercut
cards.text: Unarmed combat card; usable only by heroes. Victims of this maneuver cannot cast spells or use psionic power cards during this round of battle. (Off/4)

cards.name: Disarm
cards.text: Unarmed combat card; usable only by heroes. This maneuver strips away (discards) one magical item or artifact of an opposing champion (this player's choice). (Off/4)

cards.name: Kidney Punch
cards.text: Unarmed combat card; usable only by heroes. The opposing player must discard a card from his hand before he can play any more cards in battle. Undead are immune to this maneuver. (Off/4)

cards.name: Bear Hug
cards.text: Unarmed combat card; usable only by heroes. This maneuver halves the levels (rounded down) of an opposing champion and one ally chosen by this player. Undead are immune to this effect. (Off/4)

cards.name: Knockdown
cards.text: Unarmed combat card; usable only by defending heroes. When this card is played, the opposing champion must draw and discard a card, noting the last digit. If the number is 4 or less, the opponent returns to his pool defeated. (Def/4)

cards.name: Headlock
cards.text: Unarmed combat card; usable only by heroes. Any unarmed combat cards played by this champion after this one are doubled in level. (Def/4)

cards.name: Block
cards.text: Unarmed combat card; usable only by heroes. This maneuver counters any just-played offensive unarmed combat card, negating its effect and sending it to the discard pile. (Def/4)

cards.name: The Monty Haul Campaign
cards.text: Played at the beginning of this player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. All champions in play can cast any type of spell, use psionic power cards, and attach artifacts from any world. Only legally allowable artifacts remain if this rule card is removed from play.

cards.name: The Dream Team
cards.text: Playing this ally during a round of battle discards all other allies in play. Further allies played by opponents cannot use their special powers.

cards.name: Brain Drain
cards.text: Play this event to cancel a just-used psionic card or psionic ability or play on an opponent's pool to prevent the use of psionics by champions until the end of this player's next turn. (Harmful)

cards.name: The Toad
cards.text: Play this magical item during a round of battle to reduce an opposing wizard's or cleric's base level to 0. If attached to a monster, the champion gains an additional 4 levels. (Off)

cards.name: Lost Treasure
cards.text: Play this event to retrieve a magical item or artifact from the discard pile or to send a magical item or artifact to the Abyss. (Helpful/Harmful)

cards.name: Holy Sword Chrysomer
cards.text: Can only be attached to heroes of any world (excluding undead). Destroys up to 10 levels of opposing undead allies. Undead champions of level 8 or less cannot enter battle against the attached champion.

cards.name: Manshoon of the Zhentarim
cards.text: If Manshoon is about to be discarded for any reason (including through combat but excluding being sent to the Abyss), his player can discard a card from his hand instead. Manshoon returns to his pool; he cannot be used again until his player's next turn.

cards.name: Undead Regeneration
cards.text: Retrieve all undead from the event player's discard pile. Champions go directly to the pool, and allies to his hand. (Helpful)

cards.name: The Dark Lens
cards.text: Can only be attached to psionicists. Adds 3 levels to any psionic power card bonus. Can be discarded to use a psionic power card that cannot be canceled or countered by any means. Opposing champions cannot use psionic power cards.

cards.name: Book of the Damned
cards.text: Can only be attached to wizards. If successful during a round of combat, one friendly ally remains with the wizard, becoming undead; its level and powers are unchanged. (Def)

cards.name: Horn of Change
cards.text: Can only be attached to monsters. Once per round of battle this item forces an opponent to discard a just-played card and replace it with another. If he cannot legally play another card, he automatically loses the battle. (Off)

cards.name: Kuroth's Quill
cards.text: Once per round of combat the attached champion can choose to ignore the level bonus or power of any card or double the level bonus of a just-cast spell.

cards.name: Dodge
cards.text: Play to instantly counter one unarmed combat card or ignore one opposing ally's special power. If played to counter an unarmed combat card, this player draws two cards. (Helpful)

cards.name: Runes of the Future
cards.text: The attached champion can be discarded at the end of his player's turn to search his draw deck for any one card. Place this card so it is the first or second card drawn on the next turn. (Def)

cards.name: Cursed Idol
cards.text: If the attached champion is discarded as a result of combat, the idol transfers to the opposing champion and inflicts a terrible curse. The cursed champion must attack every round. If he cannot, his player must raze his foremost realm. (Off)

cards.name: Tower of Spirits
cards.text: Only undead may attack the attached realm.

cards.name: Gib Kcir
cards.text: Immune to harmful events. Discard this champion from her pool to the Abyss to send any nonrealm card in play to the Abyss as well.

cards.name: Dispel Psionics
cards.text: This spell can be cast at any time to negate the effects of a psionic power card or a psionicist's special power. Negated special powers cannot be used again until the end of that player's next turn. (Def)

cards.name: Psionic Reflection
cards.text: This spell can be cast at any time to reflect back the effects of a just-played offensive psionic power card upon the original user. (Def)

cards.name: Icon of Magic
cards.text: All champions in play must ask this player's permission to use offensive wizard spells.

cards.name: Nectar of the Gods
cards.text: All champions in play must ask this player's permission to use offensive cleric spells.

cards.name: Boots of Fharlanghn
cards.text: The champion wearing these boots gains earthwalking and swimming abilities as needed. A cleric wearing these boots can make unlimited attacks upon an opponent's realm until it is razed or the cleric is defeated. (Off)

cards.name: The Crystal Cave
cards.text: Only spells can be used when attacking this realm by combat. Allies, magical items, and artifacts have no effect.

cards.name: The Fair Princess
cards.text: In combat, this champion banishes opposing dragons to Limbo until the end of their owner's next turn. Dragon allies cannot be played against her.

cards.name: The Phylactery
cards.text: Can only be attached to a spellcasting undead champion. If this champion is defeated as a result of combat, send this item to the Abyss to return him to his pool instead.

cards.name: Portal to Limbo
cards.text: Play this event on an opponent's champion, who must draw and discard a card noting the last digit. The affected champion is sent to Limbo for a number of turns equal to the digit. (Harmful)

cards.name: UnderAthas
cards.text: This realm extends under opponent's Dark Sun realms, allowing them to be attacked by this player's champions and allies, regardless of position or restrictions.

cards.name: The Unipolar Triumvirate
cards.text: Adds a +3 Underdark ally to all champions of this player when attacking. The ally is negated by any other Triumvirate realm in play unless in the same player's formation.

cards.name: UnderKrynn
cards.text: This realm extends under opponent's Dragonlance realms, allowing them to be attacked by this player's champions and allies, regardless of position or restrictions.

cards.name: The Bipolar Triumvirate
cards.text: Adds a +6 Underdark ally to all champions of this player when attacking and negates the ally gained from the Unipolar Triumvirate. This ally is negated by the Tripolar and Ultimate Triumvirates unless in the same player's formation.

cards.name: The Underdark
cards.text: This realm extends under all opponent's realms that have attached holdings, allowing the realms to be attacked by this player's champions and allies, regardless of position or restrictions.

cards.name: The Tripolar Triumvirate
cards.text: Adds a +9 Underdark ally to all champions of this player when attacking and negates the ally gained from the Unipolar and Bipolar Triumvirates. This ally is negated by the Ultimate Triumvirate unless in the same player's formation.

cards.name: UnderToril
cards.text: This realm extends under opponents' Forgotten Realms realms, allowing them to be attacked by this player's champions and allies, regardless of position or restrictions.

cards.name: UnderOerth
cards.text: This realm extends under opponent's Greyhawk realms, allowing them to be attacked by this player's champions and allies, regardless of position or restrictions.

cards.name: UnderDread
cards.text: This realm extends under opponent's Ravenloft realms, allowing them to be attacked by this player's champions and allies, regardless of position or restrictions.

cards.name: The Burning Cavern
cards.text: Ancient magic from Athas's Blue Age decrees that this player's allies are immune to psionic power cards.

cards.name: The Unipolar Cavern
cards.text: If attached to any Triumvirate realm, the Underdark ally gained from the realm is immune to offensive spells.

cards.name: Subterranean Seas
cards.text: The stormy underdark of Krynn grants player's allies the ability to become swimmers.

cards.name: The Bipolar Cavern
cards.text: If attached to any Triumvirate realm, the Underdark ally gained from the realm can be dwarves, elves, earthwalkers, flyers, swimmers, or undead, as needed.

cards.name: The North Wind
cards.text: Usable only by an AD&D avatar. The attached champion and its allies can attack any realm, regardless of position or restrictions. If victorious, the realm is automatically razed.

cards.name: The Tripolar Cavern
cards.text: If attached to any Triumvirate realm, this player's Underdark allies gained from Triumvirate realms can also be used to defend.

cards.name: Echoes from the Deep
cards.text: The magic of the Deep seeps upward, rendering this player's allies immune to psionic power cards.

cards.name: Cavern of the Gods
cards.text: The ancient power of the gods bestows immunity to this player's defending allies against the special powers of champions.

cards.name: The Dread Chamber
cards.text: The dark powers, in a twist of fate, decree that this player's attacking champions are immune to the powers of all Ravenloft allies.

cards.name: Gods' Plague
cards.text: All avatars in pools are destroyed. Immune to Limited Wish. (Harmful)

cards.name: When Gods Walk
